** IMPORTANT: Before giving bad comments, please refer to the video, in which i explain how the app works. If you have doubts, drop me an e-mail. Thank you. If you need a greek version of Strong's Concordance, please refer to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=em.software.grkstrongconc ** A complete app for the most comprehensive research within the Strong' Concordance: this program allows you to search any of the terms in the database of words, with the possibility to consult not only the etymological sense of the term, but also to see the word's rendering in Hebrew characters. In order to extend as possible the versatility of the program, the app has been programmed to allow the opportunity to search for a word by typing directly the characters of the Hebrew alphabet. The searched terms could be shared by pressing the black share button on the detail screen, and be sent through BlueTooth, SMS, Facebook, etc. Since version 2.0, it's possible to view the numerical value of each word (like in traditional gematria), with notes about the process to extract a value from a word. Easy to use and very fast, this program will prove useful to those who study the Old Testament in the original language, as well as those who simply want to deepen their knowledge of Hebrew language. ** IMPORTANT: For detailed informations about how to use the program, please refer to the video linked below **

description: Broken Hearted is an original English-Language visual novel created by Rest in Peace Production. It follows Nat Levy, a 23 year old New Yorker, as he remembers the love of his life, Heather, and tries to cope with her loss on 9/11. It is a story of love, sadness... and hope. This is a port of the Ren'py version to Android. It is a visual story that uses music, pictures, and text to move the novel. Just press the screen to move the story along. This visual novel has more then 26000 words. It should take about one to two hours to complete. This story has 77 chapters in four parts. The novel has the ability to save and load. Warning: This story deals with life issues such as: Love, death, suicide, and language.

Danny my love, You asked for a letter, so this will serve as it.:) These last five years have been the most wondrous in my life. We have been through more then most people wouldn't even imagine. Marriage, love, life, disease, fire, and lost loves. Over that time, I have grown more in love with you. My wish for us is to survive as long as we can. So we can enjoy the world and life we have. I do want to do all the dreams you have for us. I ask that you look in the envelope on the whiteboard. Inside you will see some cash. That is for our first dream. Its a small amount. But I will make it grow by putting in $2 for every monster I dont drink. :) Now, for my second gift to you. I made a quick game for you. It is not very good. But it is still fun to play. Controls are on the left and right edges of the screen. After a few touches you should be able to figure it out. These are my most favorite things and I wanted to share them with you. I love you Danny. Always. Forever. Your loving husband, -Brian <3

Keep it Secret Presents... Kawaii Dash! The Fast Paced Kawaii Race with physical prizes up for grabs! ============================= Keep it Secret is proud to bring you their first ever Android Game in Association with ‘Enders Games’, Kawaii Dash! Quote from Keep it Secret: “We have played many cute games on the Android Platform and loved them all but thought we could bring an extra element of excitement to our game by providing not just virtual rewards but physical gifts though the post! Just for playing the game and winning the monthly draw for the fastest time”. ============================ Objective: Tanuki is late! - He needs to get his parcel to the post box before it falls asleep! Help Tanuki complete this task as quickly as possible. The fastest time submitted each month will end up winning goodies sent directly to them in the post! How to Play: ● Download Kawaii Dash. ● Swipe your Finger across the screen to make Tanuki run as fast as you can! ● Once you have completed the race, upload your score by submitting to Facebook or Twitter (or both!). This will automatically enter you into the Monthly prize draw to win goodies sent to you in the post. ● Remember to grab the ‘Kawaii items’ that appear on the screen for extra speed ups! ● Submitting a score will also get you valuable coupons to use at www.keep-it-secret.co.uk! ============================ Monthly Prize Draw Terms & Conditions: ● Each player of ‘Kawaii Dash’ must submit their score by Facebook, Twitter or Both to be entered automatically. ● The Winners are chosen by the fastest time submitted at the end of each month. ● Keep it Secret will Contact each winner through Facebook or Twitter only. ● Keep it Secret reserve final decision on all winners. ● Keep it Secret reserve the right to change the Terms & Conditions when needed. ============================= Contact us: Company Contact: sales@keep-it-secret.co.uk Keywords: Kawaii Game, Kawaii, Japanese Kawaii, Keep it Secret, Tanuki, Japanese Game, Anime

description: Now Better and Faster then ever! This is a space shooter where you use gravity of the planets and suns to guide your missiles. The goal of this game is to destroy the other planets before they destroy you! Watch out for meteors and shoot around asteroids. Adjust your aim to compensate for gravity. Features: * Fast Graphics * New Levels to play through. * More levels coming in the future. * New added game element every win until new level opens!. * Secret power up at 16 wins! Past Level 1, the solar system is bigger then the screen, you can use two fingers to look around the solar system. It will then slowly auto-return to your planet after release. This game is now free! I chose to place Google Ads to help support the game. I only had 2 downloads of the paid version in a year! Probably because the Demo sucks so much. So I have made this version Free to everybody. Please enjoy the game and click on an ad or two. If enough people click on ads, I have some nice ideas for more levels and unlocks. :) **** History **** Orbital Launch is my very first game on the Android Market (Google Play now) I released it mid 2011 as a very very basic game. I have increase the speed by using LibGDX and use an internal database for level saves. Credits: * Programming: Brian * Design: Brian * Font: Ivan Filipov - www.neogrey.com * ART - Planets: eleazzaar - (OpenGameArt.org user) * ART - Galaxy: hc - (OpenGameArt.org user) * ART - Missles, Explosions - danc - lostgarden.com

description: This is a test of my visual novel engine I am developing. It has simple basic functions. The story is the story that is included with the Ren'Py VN engine. This version is now much more stable. It will also scale correctly on all screen sizes. Tablet users, please email me about how it looks. Thank you. Pressing the menu button will now open a game menu with three options: * Restart: This will restart the novel from the beginning. * Load Game: This will being up a load game menu. * Save Game: This will being up the save game menu. You can now get the first Visual Novel using this engine. It is a kinetic Visual Novel about September 11, 2001. It is called Broken Hearted: A 9/11 Story. You can download it on the android market.
release_text: Adding saving and loading options. Also a restart novel option. Just press the menu key to open the game menu.

description: The new Chinese HSK Level 2 will allow you to easily and interactively dominate the official HSK Level 2. You will find a full HSK 2 dictionary and a comprehensive list of sentences and expressions spread over 11 very everyday topics. But there are more: 7 different games, +1000 challenges and 24 achievements are waiting for you. With Chinese HSK Level 2 you will listen, speak, write and play while you are checking your progress. Full stats will show your learning progress and mistakes. Dominate this Chinese level easily! (text to speech Powered by iSpeech) CONTENT ● Dictionary with the 150 HSK level 2 words ● Simplified and Traditional hanzi characters ● Save your words in your starred list ● Search words by meaning, hanzi or pinyin ● Voice search (Chinese and English, requires internet connection) ● 84 sentences and expressions spread over 11 everyday topics ● Chinese lessons (only in English, requires internet connection) ● 7 different games ● 24 achievements ● +1000 challenges ● Chinese stroke order ● Hanzi color tones ● All audio content is recorded by a Chinese native ● Possibility to record your own audio pronunciation ● Voice Recognition (requires internet connection) ● Real-time learning stats ● Check your mistakes ● Adapted for smartphone and tablet ● Available in English, French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish ● This lite version has reduced content
release_text: - Now you can search traditional hanzi - Fixed bug recording audio - Translation corrections - Fixed translation proccess to Russian language - Search of 'v' letter is 'v' letter, not 'u' letter - Copy to clipboard now hides hanzi into games - Notification icon for YCT apps - Fixed HSK and YCT link buttons in achievements - Updated iSpeech library v1.5

description: This is a Role Playing Game characters sheet manager. With a flexible structure that can be used with different games. A nice alternative to paper. Features: - templates: define the fields of the sheet, name, type, values, borders, images, notes; - characters: choose a template, fill the fields; - multiple pages structure with swipe navigation; - field icons (extra color icons in adfree version); - set characters images from the device Gallery; - send characters / templates by email; export characters in HTML; - sample Radiance RPG template included. Notes: - calculated fields accepts: + - / * % and some math functions like abs, floor, ceil, sqrt, etc. - if you find a bug or something didn't work as expected please contact me so I can correct the problem. - special thanks to Dario Nardi for Radiance RPG (www.radiancerpg.com) - there are few templates/characters included because I have to contact the editors to ask permission and it's not easy Keywords: rpg, rpg sheets, rpg tools

Es una herramienta que permite la comunicación entre las personas sordociegas y sus interlocutores a través del intercambio de información escrita y accesible. Se trata de un programa de ayuda para las personas sordociegas con una pérdida auditiva que no les permita la comprensión de los mensajes hablados y una discapacidad visual en distinto grado. Permite a la persona sordociega, de forma accesible a las características visuales y de manera presencial, la emisión de mensajes escritos ante interlocutores y el acceso a la respuesta de estos. Además CTO permite al usuario sordociego la utilización de mensajes pregrabados con anticipación para iniciar una comunicación o utilizarlos durante la misma. Dispone de la posiblidad de utilizar el programa como un editor accesible de textos, bien para utilizarlos en otras aplicaciones o en el propio CTO. It is a tool that allows communication between deafblind people and their partners through the exchange of written and accessible. It is a program to help deafblind people with hearing loss that does not allow them to understand spoken messages and visually impaired to varying degrees. Allows the deafblind person, so accessible to and in person visual characteristics, issuing written messages to partners and access to the response of these. CTO also allows the user deafblind using prerecorded messages in advance to initiate communication or use for it. It offers the possibility to use the program as an accessible text editor, or for use in other applications or the CTO itself.
release_text: Versión 1.0.1 - Mejoras para la correcta visualización en tablets de 7 pulgadas.

En él encontrarás una amplia variedad de canales de cine, series, contenido infantil, documentales, programas de entretenimiento y las mejores competiciones deportivas. 4 Line Bluetooth is the classic game of Connect 4 in a row for one player or two players. You can play against mobile CPU in two difficulty levels or against another user on the same device or via Bluetooth. Take advantage of Bluetooth technology to play with your friends through 4 Line and defeat them being the first to connect 4 in a row. The game features 2 different boards, selection of 8 different colors of chips and we will deploy an online version that lets you play a 4 Line around the world and be the 4 in a row world champion. Thanks to its statistical system you can also determine whether you are the best in connect 4 online on your device. Soon you will beat against the whole world and know well if you're the king of 4 Line.

Championship Race One 2015 App is available for free download and offers leaderboard, lap times, sector classification, drivers, races and teams information and session commentary throughout the 2015 season in a brand new interface. The available sections in the application are: - Ranking (drivers and teams) - Race calendar - Live sessions during the races - Drivers data - Other drivers data (inactive, hall of fame and testers) - Teams data - Other teams data (inactive) - GPs data - Other GPs data (from 6 years ago until now) - Regulations 2015 - Notification two days before a race PLEASE, IF YOU LIKE THE APPLICATION FROM TIME TO TIME CLICK ON ADVERTISING. IF YOU DON'T LIKE OR HAVE ANY SUGGESTION PLEASE SEND ME AN EMAIL BEFORE GIVE NEGATIVE SCORE. This App is unofficial and is not associated in any way with the Formula One group of companies. description: India, officially the Republic of India, is a country in South Asia. It is the seventh-largest country by area, the second-most populous country with over 1.2 billion people, and the most populous democracy in the world. Bounded by the Indian Ocean on the south, the Arabian Sea on the south-west, and the Bay of Bengal on the south-east, it shares land borders with Pakistan to the west; China, Nepal, and Bhutan to the north-east; and Burma and Bangladesh to the east. In the Indian Ocean, India is in the vicinity of Sri Lanka and the Maldives; in addition, India's Andaman and Nicobar Islands share a maritime border with Thailand and Indonesia. The Indian economy is the world's eleventh-largest by nominal GDP and third-largest by purchasing power parity. Following market-based economic reforms in 1991, India became one of the fastest-growing major economies; it is considered a newly industrialized country… India should be a country to know about. In this application, we collect over 300 essays on India that could help you to learn a lot of India.

In der EU sind etwa 320 Zusatzstoffe zugelassen. Kennen Sie alle? Was essen Sie, wenn in der Zutatenliste E 407 steht? Wofür wird Carrageen eigentlich verwendet? Ist der Stoff auch für Bio-Produkte zugelassen? Kaufen Sie sich kein Buch, welches morgen schon veraltet ist. Diese App bietet Ihnen eine Liste über die zugelassenen Zusatzstoffe und versucht Ihnen den Verwendungszweck zu erklären, so dass Sie selbst entscheiden können, ob Sie lieber ein Produkt ohne diesen Zusatzstoff kaufen wollen. Alle Daten werden über das Internet geladen. Eine Offline-Nutzung ist in der kostenlosen Variante nicht möglich. Werbefrei und mit Informationen über die Demeter-Zulassung in der Pro-Variante. Suche nach E-Nummern oder Verkehrsnamen möglich. Leider ist es wieder erlaubt auch einen üblichen Namen in der Zutatenliste zu nutzen, statt der E-Nummer. Zusätzlich muss jedoch der Klassenname mit angegeben sein: Farbstoff, Konservierungsstoff, Antioxydationsmittel, Emulgatoren (Stabilisatoren), Dickungsmittel (Geliermittel), Säurungsmittel (Säureregulatoren), Trennmittel (Überzugsmittel, Tauchmassen), Geschmacksverstärker (einige Aromastoffe), Zuckeraustauschstoffe (künstliche Süßstoffe), Stoffe für sonstige technologische Zwecke, Stoffe für besondere Ernährungszwecke (Vitamine, modifizierte Stärke). Anregungen, Wünsche etc. bitte an android@codefabrik.de - wir können leider nicht auf Kommentare im Play-Store antworten. Keywords: E-Nummern, E-Nummer, E-Number, Zusatzstoff, 1333/2008, ZZulV In the EU, about 320 food additives permitted. Do you know any? What do you eat when on sale in the list of ingredients E407? What is Carrageenan actually used? If the substance is also approved for organic products? Do not buy a book that is obsolete tomorrow. This app provides you with a list of approved additives and tried to explain to you the purpose, so that you can decide for yourself whether you would rather buy a product without this additive. All data is loaded via the Internet. An offline use is not possible in the free version. Ad free and with information about the Demeter approval in the Pro version. Search E-numbers or names traffic possible. Unfortunately, it is again also allows you to use a common name in the list of ingredients, instead of the E-number. In addition, however, the class name must be specified with: dye, preservative, antioxidant, emulsifiers (stabilizers), thickeners (gelling agent), acidity regulator (acidity regulators), releasing agent (coating agent, diving masses), flavor enhancer (some flavorings), sugar substitutes (artificial sweeteners), substances for other technological purposes, materials for particular nutritional purposes (vitamins, modified starch). Suggestions, requests, etc., please contact android@codefabrik.de - unfortunately we can not respond to comments in the Play Store. Keywords: E-numbers, e-number, e-Number, additive, 1333/2008, ZZulV
release_text: - Abstürze auf einigen Geräten behoben - Probleme mit Anzeige von Sonderzeichen in der Auflistung behoben

description: The European Weathernetwork-app with lightning-notificaction. The app is based on the EWN-website with a few addons. - Shows current conditions for 10 closest weatherstations (private, roadstations, metoffice-stations and synops), totally more that 4500 stations in Europe - Map of current conditions - Blitzortung stormtracker with lightning-notification - EWN Forecast giving as default the forecast for your location, searchable for more than 850000 locations in Europe - Forecast maps - Widget showing the closest weatherstation The app are still a bit in BETA-phase, please report via EWN website ( http://www.europeanweathernetwork.eu ) contactform for found oddities. Also ideas for possible additions are welcome. Known bugs: - Widget in tablets are not perfect - Due to lack of close thunder-activity are the lightning-notification not well tested yet

Androggle is a brain teaser which is quite addictive! The intention of this game is to reach as many points as possible with finding as long as possible existing words out of a randomized letter field until the time is up. Androggle comes with a huge vocabulary of more than 400.000 words. The letters' combinations in the field are randomized and not limited. Features: - Huge English dictionary with more than 400.000 words - 4x4 board with unlimited combinations - Swipe (swipe your words) - HD graphics (suitable for tablet devices) - Local highscore - Online highscore (Compete with the best in the world) - Awards feature for each mode - Online badge rankings - 2 different dice designs - Optional vibration - Optional sound - Supports SD-card - Send-a-word function: If you should find a missing word, we will add it! *** Pro-Version limited time promotion price *** Additional Pro Features - The Solution Generator reveals all the words that you have not found - Additional field size in 5x5 - 2 additional game modes (cross mode and free mode) - All features usable in each game mode and field size - Global online highscore for each mode - Online badge rankings for each mode - 3 additional cube designs - Completely ad-free and offline playable Besides the never-ending fun, Androggle challenges and improves your literacy skills. Related topics: Boggle game, game of dice, learn english, riddle, puzzle, logic, language, smart, brain, dictionary, word search, letter mix, find words, word finding, cross word, boggle, puzzle game, Androggle, free To improve the quality of our app we collect anonymous user statistics.
release_text: 2.0.1 - added HD graphics - improved design - integrated Swipe (swipe the words) - integrated Solution Generator - different dice designs - revised ranking system - better comprehensibility in highscores - expanded vocabulary - new award - revised options menu - enhanced navigation in highscores and awards

description: Friskies® Cat Fishing is an all-new game designed especially for cats. Tap “start” and get ready to watch your cat go for the catch of the day. The more he catches, the more challenging the game becomes. Enjoy three levels of fun with one, two and three fish at a time to test your cat to the max!   How to play Cat Fishing:  • Place tablet on flat surface near your cat • Tap “start”  • Watch your cat score points • A reward for your cat (We suggest some Friskies kibbles) Please be aware that in our experience, the bare glass screen holds up trouble-free to a cat’s claws, but plastic add-on screen protectors might not.

With this simple, powerfull and free app you can reveal meanings of thousands of medical abbreviations in English language. It contains directory of about 2,5k most common used medical terms: abbreviations, acronyms and symbols extended by external sources with tons of medical terminology. Glossary is searchable through powerfull voice enabled search engine with word prediction and smart option that let you narrow search result to abbreviations only. Full support for system search engine - you can search in our app directly from homescreen Google search widget. App will help you to understand mystery looking abbreviations from medical records, prescriptions or expert advices. Most of terms have solid explanation on Wikipedia - app will let you study them on your wish. If your search didn't return any match in internal database app can use best external source which have defined - mainly online databases from World Health Organization. This app is for everyone, not only medical staff and students, because we all need sometimes medical help and want to find out more. This is totally free app so give it a try and install it today. For your convenience app is localized for English, German, Spanish, French, Russian, Polish and Italian. Additional languages coming soon. Curious why app want access to phone call status ? It's used by advertising engine. Now You can block advertising and get rid of banners saving more screen space for an app and getting some pace of mind about curious app permissions. This app is available on another platforms - check out our webpage: m.ipix.eu for more info. You can find there more not only medical related apps.
release_text: Updated database and added new medical abbreviations. Refreshed user interface.

description: Note this is the Lite version of the application. It allows you to test full functionality of the import and export with 50 contacts before buying the PRO version which supports up to 5,000 contacts. Ever wanted to import your contacts from Microsoft Outlook onto your phone with a few simple clicks? Or wanted to quickly transfer your contacts from one Android phone to another? Then this app is your answer! This app is the Swiss Army knife for Android contacts with all the features you will ever need in a small highly optimised app with no evil cloud syncing. With this app you will never have to give your contacts to Google, Yahoo, or any other Cloud service again. Your contacts will remain confidential to you. Multi-language fully supported including all common localised codepages (from US & Western Europe to Eastern Europe to China and Japan) and also UTF, so you get your contact information exactly how it should be on the phone. Features ======= - Import contacts from a CSV file - Backup and Restore Contacts - Export contacts from any account to a CSV file - Delete contacts and groups from any account - View contacts and groups from any account - Comprehensive in-app logging. This app requires no internet permissions. Your contacts will never be shared and will always remain fully in your control. See below for a list and explanation of the permissions required by this app. Please try this lite version first which gives you all the features but limits them to 50 contacts. It does not have any annoying ads. Please purchase the full version for all these great features with support for up to 5000 contacts. Permissions ========== A full list and explanation of the permissions required by this app: - Find accounts on device Needed to get a list of existing contacts accounts on the phone - Add or remove accounts Needed to create this app's "My Contacts" contact account on the phone - Create accounts and set passwords - Use accounts on this device Both needed to access and view contacts in any contact account on the phone - Read sync statistics - Read sync settings - Toggle sync on and off All needed to create and manage a sync adaptor used to read and write contacts to this app's "My Contacts" contact account - Read your contacts Needed to read contacts from any contacts account on the phone - Modify your contacts Needed to write contacts to this app's "My Contacts" contact account on the phone - Modify or delete the contents of your USB storage Needed to save contact backup and export files to the SD card - Modify system settings - Test access to protected storage Both needed to save this app's preferences - Prevent phone from sleeping Needed when processing a large number of contacts when the app is in the background. Released immediately when no longer required

Find out what slows your Android device! CPU Monitor application provides information about all running applications on the device. Gets the CPU usage for each process. The data collected in real-time configurable interval (1-10 seconds). In the PRO version, you can choose any applications to be monitored. CPU usage is displayed on the notification bar and on the widget. After exceeding a predetermined threshold level (10%), the color in the list and on the widget changes from green through yellow, to red. Compared to competing applications, the CPU Monitor is much better because it uses only about 1% of the CPU to work in monitoring mode in the background, and about 4-10% while the standard. The PRO ads are disabled. Required qualifications: INTERNET, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - to display ads in the free version and support my work (you can remove the ads in the "Remove Ads") CHECK_LICENSE - control of the pay-version license GET_TASKS, RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED - to read data processor and automatically start the application
release_text: Notification of exceeding the acceptable level of the CPU in the device. The level of the CPU is configurable by the user. Fixes for Android 6.0.

DiveMax Air is a fast and incredibly simple mobile dive planner that provides safe dive plans for recreational divers who plan their own dives. It also allows the user to modify the plan in real-time. Picture yourself on the deck of a dive boat. It’s a sunny morning and the ocean is calm and inviting. You and your diving group are getting ready to jump in the water. The others pick up their RDP tables, pens and papers and start calculating their first dive. You take your smartphone, open DiveMax and with a few simple finger strokes plan safe dives for the whole day within just 20 seconds. You and your buddy can hit the waters before the others have even finished planning their first dive. Picture yourself back on the boat after the first dive. You followed a turtle a little deeper than you had planned or stayed a bit longer in the maximum depth, so now you need to modify the plan for the following dives. While the others need to erase the old plans and start over with the RDP tables, you go back to your DiveMax plan and simply move the first diver according to the executed dive, and DiveMax automatically calculates the effects on the subsequent dives. With the updated dive plan quickly taken care of, you can take it easy and enjoy the break until it is time to dive again. EASY & INFORMATIVE Simply touch the diver with your finger to move him; DiveMax immediately calculates the effects in real time and shows them in an informative graph. DiveMax also clearly indicates when your plan is safe and executable. SAFE Calculations on effects of nitrogen pressure in tissues are based on Dr. Albert A. Bühlmann's decompression algorithm, the same algorithm used in dive computers. Compared to traditional RDP tables, planning dives with DiveMax eliminates the possibility of human errors as all calculations are always done by computer. ACKNOWLEDGED Previously known as DiveX, the application was awarded as the best mobile sports application in the global Calling All Innovators 2011 competition.
release_text: By recommendation from DAN, flight time after second dive increased to 24h.

If you enjoy this, please get the paid version so we can keep making these! Lots of options let you tweak the detail level of the simulation, switch backgrounds, change paint colors, modify how thick the paint is, how it blends on the wall, and more!

description: NO OFFICIAL app that allows to access your files in the new MEGA service by Kim Dotcom. This application communicates directly with mega.co.nz servers. It has been written from scratch specifically for Android. Now with streaming!! Play your music or your videos instantly as they are downloading, starting from where you want. It also works with MEGA links. You will need a good video player to improve compatibility with codecs and formats. MX Player and BSPlayer seem to work perfectly, but you can use any other. Also, you can block the app using an unlock pattern to preserve your privacy ;-) Please report errors to pycusoft@gmail.com . It currently allows to: - Acess to your mega.co.nz account - Download your files - Download folders (including subfolders and taking care of already downloaded files) - Upload files to any folder - Upload folders (including subfolders and taking care of already uploaded files) - Create new folders - Create links for your files and share them - Download mega.co.nz links - Create new accounts - Delete files - Cancel uploads/downloads - Navigate through your folders - Rename files and folders - Select download folder - Open downloaded files from notification bar - Streaming! even with subtitles support. - Download and streaming from shared folders - Move files and folders - Add and delete contacts - Instantly send files and folders to your Mega contacts - Get and share links for folders - Download folder links - View thumbnails for uploaded/downloaded images. - Upload files from other apps, using share/send file option. - Manage several accounts with custom names. - Open files with only one click (they are opened automatically after download) - Download and stream link from mega-search.me ( http://mega-search.me/?goto=XXXXX ) - Open Mega links by clicking in other apps (Browser, Gmail, WhatsApp...) In order to upload any type of file, you must install a good file explorer like "ES File Explorer" or any other. Otherwise, your phone will be able to upload audio and image files only. You can also upload files using the "Share/Send file" option from any other app. We would like to receive your comments, suggestions or bug reports at pycusoft@gmail.com . We hope you enjoy this app. Cheers! ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS: Tito B. Ngomo, for his important collaboration testing the app, sending suggestions and reporting errors. French translation (William Meunier) Permissions: New in version 1.40: android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE There is a new synchronization feature that you can configure to be activated only over WiFi. The app needs this permission to know if the phone/tablet is connected over WiFi or 3G. android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED If you activate the new synchronization feature, the app needs to start in order to know when a new media file is added to the phone. This permission allows the application start this feature at boot time. android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE This version has an integrated audio player to play your audio files in streaming. The app needs this permission to stop the music if a new phone call arrives Previous permissions: android.permission.INTERNET This is needed to upload/download your files. android.permission.WAKE_LOCK This is needed to prevent that the WiFi and the CPU go to sleep when uploading/downloading a large file. android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE This is needed to be able to download to your external storage (SD, USB storage...)
release_text: 1.48 - Compatibility with the new MEGA API 1.47 - Fixed login with non ASCII characters in the password - Fixed recognition of mega-search.me links - Prevent that the app uploads its own cache to Mega while syncing. - Other minor bug fixes. 1.45 - Shuffle feature for the audio player (in the menu) - Account information in settings (used and total storage) - Minor GUI fixes - Fixed synchronization in SD for several devices - Fixed other errors reported by users (thanks!)

description: This modern bold Smart Launcher Theme is designed specifically for use with bright background wallpapers. This theme comes with multiple icon outlines (bubbles) and Analog Clock Widget shapes, including Hexagons, Squares, Circles, and Octagons. You need Smart Launcher installed on your phone to use this theme. To use it, first install, then in Smart Launcher hit App Drawer > Menu Button > Preferences > Theme > The Absence Of Light - Pack. To change bubble shapes go to App Drawer > Menu Button > Preferences > Theme Settings (to the right of Theme) > Bubbles: background I recommend that users install the Stamped Dark Icon Pack if it doesn't install automatically and enable it by doing the following: App Drawer>Menu Button>Theme Settings>Bubbles:icons theme In Android 4.4, if your status and navigation bar do not show up well against a light background you can disable the transparency in Smart Launcher settings by clicking App Drawer>Menu Button>Preferences>Global Settings> Transparent Decorations. Email me with any requests for a similar theme with a different color, bubble shape, or clock font. I am very responsive to user emails!

description: Med Procedures : all your medical procedures in photos, step-by-step, in your pocket ! Important introduction : - Med Procedures is an application aimed exclusively at medical personnel. - The collection of procedures available is continually evolving, being updated regularly by the application. Watch to keep track of future developments. What is a procedure ? Each downloadable procedure comprises : - An introduction summarizing the definition, the indications and the contraindications for the medical procedure in question. - A detailed list of the equipment required to carry out the procedure, often with a photo showing the assembled equipment. - A series of photos with comments and annotations setting out step-by-step how to perform the technical procedure, giving the traditional method and possible alternatives. - A Tips page giving further information about the technique itself, the alternatives, the underlying pathology. - A page for personal notes to be filled in at your leisure. Convinced that an image is worth 1000 words, the Médicilline editors have been developing publications based on this concept for several years. Now with the technological skills of Alkeo, you can consult Med Procedures, the spearhead of its collection, on your Android. The Android application of the same name gives you a medical database that is unrivalled in the field : thousands of photos with comments and annotations detailing hundreds of medical procedures step-by-step, from the most basic to the most specialized. This collection has been put together by medical practitioners who are all highly-experienced professionals in their respective domains and has been validated by university hospital teams. Details of the application’s technical specifications : - Quick and simple application for easy everyday use. - Automatic updates of the set of procedures already available. - Purchase of individual procedures. - Automatic updates of already downloaded procedures (technical developments, addition of further details …). - Visualization of the different steps of the procedures in landscape or portrait format. - Possibility of zooming X2 on the image if required. - Addition of personal notes to the procedures. - Possibility of sharing through social or email networks. If an image is worth 1000 words, a trial is worth 1000 arguments : install the Med Procedures application on your Android now ! Send us your user views and comments via the contact form of the application (About page, icon at top right).

Avec l’Espace Client Mobile Bouygues Telecom : Suivez votre conso et gérez votre compte où et quand vous le souhaitez. Nouveau : l’application est désormais accessible pour TOUS LES CLIENTS B&YOU ! Nos clients et la communauté des experts Woobees répondront à toutes vos demandes. ---- AUTRES APPLICATIONS BOUYGUES TELECOM ---- TV Bouygues Telecom, B.Cloud, B.TV mobile, Messagerie Vocale Bbox, Bienvenue, World&YOU, SMS&YOU, Appels & YOU, B.duo With the Customer Mobile Bouygues Telecom: Follow your conso and manage your account wherever and whenever you want. New: the application is now available for ALL CUSTOMERS B & YOU! Over 1 MILLION CLIENTS have already downloaded and regularly use it! ------ ------- DESCRIPTION OF FEATURES MONITORING CONSUMER: Your detailed voice and internet consumption in France and abroad; as well as that of your family or your family members. INVOICES: The details of your last 12 bills available in a glance (subscriptions, without the package, carry minutes, payment method ...) PERSOS INFO: Your personal information (email, address, line ...) and the possibility to change them. PACKAGE AND MOBILE: Your changes packages, mobile and shopping options in a few clicks. ASSISTANCE: All Bouygues Telecom accompaniment accessible with one click from your mobile - Instructions: to control the functionality of your mobile. - Support and forum Woobees: to find all the answers to your questions. - Diagnosis Bbox: to solve a problem Internet / TV on your Bbox or decoder. - Contact Adviser: for personalized recommendations on your mobile or Bbox. ------TERMS OF USE -------- COMPATIBILITY: application accessible for all customers holding 4.0.3 (or later) ELIGIBILITY: All features are available to customers Bouygues Telecom mobile packages, Ideo, B & YOU (again), and Bbox Pro. APP SUPPORT: For any problem with the application, please contact us via the forum http://www.forum.bouyguestelecom.fr mentioning "Get Customer Mobile" in the title of your question. Our customers and the community Woobees experts will answer all your requests. ---- ---- OTHER APPLICATIONS Bouygues Telecom TV Bouygues Telecom, B.Cloud, B.TV mobile, Voice Mail Bbox, Welcome, World & YOU, YOU & SMS, Calls & YOU, B.duo

Découvrez l’application officielle « Caf - Mon Compte ». Allocataire de la Caf ? Retrouvez « Mon Compte » maintenant sur votre mobile. L’application Caf - Mon Compte est gratuite et vous permet d’accéder de manière simple, pratique et sécurisée aux informations relatives à votre dossier d'allocataire. 1. CONSULTER MES VERSEMENTS Accédez rapidement à vos 10 derniers paiements (dates et montants) en parcourant votre historique jusqu'aux 24 derniers mois. Vous pouvez également télécharger sur votre mobile vos relevés ou attestations au format PDF. 2. GERER MES INFORMATIONS PERSONNELLES Retrouvez les renseignements sur votre situation et modifiez, si nécessaire, vos coordonnées (adresse mél, téléphone). 3. SUIVRE MES DEMARCHES EN LIGNE Suivez l’avancement de vos démarches faites sur caf.fr et soyez informés à chaque connexion en cas d’éléments manquants. 4. SIMPLIFIER LES ECHANGES AVEC MA CAF En une seule rubrique, retrouvez vos échanges avec votre Caf (courriers, courriels…) et soyez alertés en cas de nouveaux messages. SECURISEE, SIMPLE et INTUITIVE, téléchargez dès maintenant l’application Caf - Mon Compte et consultez à tout moment votre dossier d'allocataire. Discover the official application "Caf - My Account". Recipient of the Caf? Find "My Account" now on your mobile. The Caf Application - My Account is free and allows you to access a simple, convenient and secure information relating to your recipient folder. 1. SEE MY PAYMENTS Quickly access your last 10 payments (dates and amounts) in your browsing history until the last 24 months. You can also download your statements on your mobile or certificates in PDF format. 2. MANAGE MY PERSONAL INFORMATION Find information about your situation and change, if necessary, contact information (email address, phone number). 3. FOLLOW MY STEPS ONLINE Follow the progress of your steps taken and be informed on caf.fr each connection in case of missing elements. 4. SIMPLE EXCHANGE WITH MY CAF In one section, find your interaction with your Caf (mail, email ...) and be alerted to new messages. SAFE, SIMPLE and INTUITIVE, download now the Caf Application - My Account at any time and check your beneficiary file.

Garmin Connect Uploader can upload your activities on Garmin Connect platform within 2 clics. Supported activity files are: - FIT - TCX - GPX Garmin Connect Uploader can upload single or multiple files at once. In "single file" mode, you pick your file and it's direclty sent to Garmin Connect. The result of the upload is displayed once it's completed. In "multiple files" mode, you just have to pick a directory, select activities you want to upload and it's done. Once uploaded you can click on the result icon to get more info about your uploads. The five last activities which have not already been uploaded are pre-checked in multi upload mode.
release_text: Version 1.4: Fix Garmin Connect upload issue. Version 1.3: Fix Garmin Connect upload issue. Version 1.2: Fix Garmin Connect upload issue.

description: Have you recently quit smoking, or been wanting to quit? Kwit is exactly what you need! Kwit uses game design techniques, game thinking and game mechanics to encourage people to quit smoking. You reach higher and higher levels and rankings as you try to become the Ultimate Kwitter. You'll have access to useful statistics such as the time passed since you've stopped smoking, the money you've saved and the number of cigarettes you haven't smoked. You can monitor these statistics live. There are also 60 achievements for you to unlock. When you reach some of them you'll even get info about the benefits of stopping smoking for your body and your life. Finally, you'll be able to share your progress with your friends on Facebook, Twitter and by email. Shake your mobile to draw a motivational card (40 different cards available) when you feel craving for a cigarette coming on. You'll get a tip on how to avoid lighting up and feel better. Quitting smoking is the best thing you can do for yourself. Get started now and have some fun doing it!

description: Salariés et exploitants agricoles, l'application "ma MSA et moi" a été conçue pour vous et votre famille. Gratuite, simple et pratique elle vous permet : - de suivre en direct l'actualité de la MSA - de savoir si vous avez droit à la CMU Complémentaire (CMU-C) ou à une aide complémentaire santé (ACS). - de connaître et consulter vos paiements (remboursements santé, indemnités journalières, prestations familiales, retraite...), pour les titulaires d'un espace privé MSA. Les identifiants de connexion de votre espace privé mobile MSA sont identiques à ceux de votre espace privé internet. Si vous n'avez pas encore d'espace privé MSA, vous pouvez le créer en quelques minutes sur le site de la MSA : http://msa.fr . Workers and farmers, the application "my MSA and I" was designed for you and your family. Free, simple and convenient it allows you to: - Follow live news from the MSA - Whether you are entitled to Supplementary CMU (CMU-C) or additional support (CHA). - Know and consult your payments (health reimbursement, daily allowances, family benefits, retirement ...), for holders of a private space MSA. The login to your private mobile space MSA are identical to those of your private online space. If you do not have any private space MSA, you can create in minutes on the site of the MSA: http://msa.fr .
release_text: Cette nouvelle version (V2) permet désormais de : - visualiser et télécharger les décomptes de vos remboursements santé. Vous pouvez également les envoyer à un correspondant par e-mail, - visualiser et envoyer par email votre attestation de droit maladie. Cette attestation peut être utilisée dans certains cas en lieu et place de votre « attestation vitale ». - demander l'envoi d'un nouveau mot de passe en cas d'oubli de votre mot de passe personnel Révision du design et de l'ergonomie.

description: The third learning adventure in the Nickelodeon Literacy Suite, Dora ABCs Vol 3: Ready to Read! focuses on your child's early reading and phonics skills. After reviewing letter sounds in Dora ABCs Vol 1: Letter & Letter Sounds, and learning phonemic awareness with Dora ABCs Vol 2: Rhyming Words your child is now ready to read! In Dora ABCs Vol 3: Ready to Read!, your child will begin to see that letters can be organized in a specific sequence to represent words. By changing the beginning, final or middle letters of these words, they can turn one word into another, a game called "word ladders". The ability to manipulate first, last and inside letters of simple words is an important skill to becoming a proficient reader. In this game, Dora and Boots need your child's help crossing Water Lily Lake to get to the Fantastic Frog Fiesta on the other side. By sounding out words or changing letters of words to make new ones, the player will help Dora and Boots cross the lake by hopping on the lily pads. Supportive directions and sound effects help guide your child in learning how to sound out words and start to read. In between phonics activities, three whimsical mini games with Dora's frog friends offer additional play: turn lily pads to get the frogs to a flower, match colorful frogs and flowers, or stack all the frogs on a moving lily pad to reach a high flower. All three games are interspersed among the phonics activities. Dora and Boots can't make it to the Fantastic Frog Fiesta without your child's help! ¡Vámonos! Let's go! Dora ABCs Vol 3: Ready to Read! includes: • Easy to use tutorials lead by Dora • 5 Levels of game play with a rich set of age appropriate words for beginning readers • Curriculum developed and reviewed by preschool education expert • Word ladders in which kids can change words by manipulating first, last and inside sounds. • Three whimsical frog mini games that are entertaining and replayable • Voiceovers that reinforce letter sounds and identify the vocabulary words • Tested by kids • Player profiles allow more than one child to play and saves their progress • Parent reporting which shows you how your child is progressing in this app. Dora ABCs Vol 3: Ready to Read! collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data). User data collection is in accordance with applicable law, such as COPPA. User data may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeon’s use of personal user data, please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms, conditions or policies agreed to between you and Google. Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Google's collection or use of your personal user data and information. Use of this app is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement. Privacy Policy: http://www.nickjr.com/info/privacy-policy.html End User License Agreement: http://www.nick.com/info/eula.html

Découvrez la nouvelle application du Crédit Agricole Ile de France vous permettant, depuis votre téléphone, de localiser facilement et rapidement toutes ses agences les plus proches de vous et d’accéder gratuitement au WIFI au sein de ses agences bancaires. La localisation d’agences Crédit Agricole Simple et intuitive, cette application offre la possibilité d’avoir à portée de main accès à toutes les agences du Crédit Agricole Ile de France ! En quelques secondes, elle vous propose les agences les plus proches de vous. Cette application vous permet d’accéder aux fonctionnalités suivantes : - Affichage de la recherche en mode carte (Maps), en mode liste ou en mode réalité augmentée - En mode carte, possibilité de visualiser les itinéraires à réaliser pour rejoindre les agences les plus proches - Indication de la distance à parcourir entre votre position et les agences à proximité - Mention de l’adresse, des coordonnées, des horaires d’ouverture et des services bancaires proposés dans chaque agence - Différents choix sont proposés pour réaliser une recherche : par géolocalisation, par zone ou encore par adresse - Possibilité de contacter les agences directement par mail ou par téléphone depuis l’application Vous n’êtes pas client du Crédit Agricole ? Vous pouvez quand même télécharger l’application pour rechercher une agence.  L’accès au WIFI au sein des agences Crédit Agricole Vous souhaitez vous connecter gratuitement à Internet au sein des agences bancaires du Crédit Agricole ? Maintenant, c’est possible avec cette application. En démarrant celle-ci et après s’être identifié une première fois, accédez facilement au WIFI du Crédit Agricole pour surfer librement sur Internet. Discover the new application Crédit Agricole Ile de France for you, from your phone, quickly and easily locate all the agencies closest to you and free WIFI access in its bank branches. The location of agencies Crédit Agricole Simple and intuitive, this application provides the ability to have handy access to all branches of Crédit Agricole Ile de France! Within seconds, it offers the closest you agencies. This application allows you to access the following features: - Display of search map mode (Maps) in list mode or in augmented reality fashion - In map mode, can view routes to be done to reach the closest agencies - Indication of the distance between your position and nearby agencies - Mention the address, contact information, opening hours and banking services offered in each agency - Various choices are available to perform a search: geolocation, by area or by address - Possibility to contact the agency directly by email or phone from the application You are not a client of Credit Agricole? You can still download the application to search for an agency. Access to WIFI in agencies Crédit Agricole You want to connect to the Internet for free within the Crédit Agricole bank branches? Now it is possible with this application. Starting it and after identifying the first time, easy access to WIFI Crédit Agricole to surf the Internet freely.

MutePhone allows you to schedule a silent mode (mute) for your Android Phone ("Do not disturb"). You won't be disturbed at night due to a notification or a phone call any more ! (The application does not change the volume of your alarm.) Website MutePhone website: http://www.progmatique.fr/freewares/freeware-8-MutePhone.html

description: La référence de l’actualité scientifique enfin disponible sur mobile et tablette Android. Un grand merci à tous pour vos commentaires et encouragements ! N'hésitez pas à nous communiquer vos remarques et suggestions directement par email à l'adresse support-mobiles@sciencesetavenir.fr Suivez en direct les dernières découvertes scientifiques, les avancées de la recherche... Mais aussi toute l'actualité de l'exploration spatiale, de l'astronomie, des nouvelles technologies, des questions d'environnement et de santé. Décryptage, dossiers, rencontres, reportages, infographies, quiz... sont autant de façons d'aborder l'actualité des sciences et du savoir vue par la rédaction de Sciences et Avenir. Des fonctionnalités avancées pour votre mobile et votre tablette : - une mise en page qui s'adapte automatiquement à l'écran de votre téléphone et de votre tablette - une vue rapide et personnalisable des informations-clés du moment - des alertes d'actualité paramétrables et la possibilité de s'inscrire aux newsletters - les articles et les dépêches classés par rubrique - la possibilité de sauvegarder et de commenter les articles directement depuis l'application - le partage rapide d'article par email et via Facebook, Twitter, Google+ et LinkedIn The reference science news finally available on mobile and Android tablet. A big thank you to all for your comments and encouragement! Do not hesitate to send us your comments and suggestions by email to support-mobiles@sciencesetavenir.fr Follow live the latest scientific discoveries, advances in research ... But also news of space exploration, astronomy, new technologies, environmental and health issues. Decryption, folders, meetings, reports, graphics, quizzes ... are many ways to approach the news of science and knowledge for the preparation of Sciences et Avenir. Advanced features for your mobile and tablet: - A layout that automatically adjusts the screen of your phone and tablet - A quick and customizable view key information of the moment - Customisable news alerts and the ability to register for newsletters - Articles and news sorted by category - The ability to save and comment on the articles directly from the application - The rapid sharing article by email and on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and LinkedIn
release_text: Merci pour vos nombreux retours. Continuez de nous envoyer vos remarques à support-mobiles@sciencesetavenir.fr, elles seront prises en compte pour les prochaines versions. Au menu de cette mise à jour : • corrections de bugs mineurs • amélioration de l'affichage des vidéos

NOW WITH NINE NEW SKINS!!! Ghost Detector Pro is an application that uses your mobile device sensors to detect sources of variable magnetic emissions. Which could indicate us the presence of some kind of paranormal activity. Not be shown magnetic fields at constant frequencies such as those generated by electronics, for example: TV, routers, computers, chargers, mobile phones, etc. The application will show a green dot on the radar in case there is nearby a source of magnetic emission. The detection range varies between 0 and 30 feet approximately, depending on the mobile device used.

Easypay app is an innovative service of Piraeus Bank that helps you make bill payments wherever you are, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. EVERYONE CAN USE easypay app You don’t need to be a Piraeus Bank customer. You only have to - use a MasterCard or Visa card (debit, credit or prepaid) issued by any bank (Greek or non-Greek) and - either · already be a registered user of easypay.gr service or, · subscribe to easypay through the app, following a fully on-line procedure that lasts less than a minute. YOU MAY PAY YOUR BILLS AND OBLIGATIONS The following bill payments are currently available: - COSMOTE Mobile - COSMOTE Fixed - OTE TV - Residential - Forthnet phone bills - Vodafone-hol - Nova - Forthnet Media - Vodafone mobile phone bills - Wind mobile phone bills - Verified Tax Obligations(*) - DEI (Public Power Company) utility bills(*) - EYDAP water and sewage bills(*) - Vehicle Tax Fees(*) You may also load your e-pass device for Attiki Odos. IT IS EASY TO USE You may pay your bills by: - scanning the barcode on the billing statement – if provided by the organization, or - simply filling in the necessary fields required and are displayed on the billing statement. By using the “Scan the card” feature you may scan your card’s details instead of typing them and you may also save them – assigning an alias name – for future use. IT IS SAFE All the above mentioned are supported by Piraeus Bank, following very demanding security standards. HELP IS ALWAYS AVAILABLE For additional information or support, you may contact Piraeus Bank customer support at +30 210 3288000 or email us at support@easypay.gr . (*) Available only for cards issued by Piraeus Bank

Snap is a card game for two players. Play against the computer and try to win more points. Rules are simple. After the deck is shuffled, the two players receive 6 cards each. Another 4 cards are thrown at the table. The players take turns in throwing cards. Throw a card with the same number with the card at the top of the pile and you win all the cards at the table. Also a Jack, which is a special card, always wins all the cards down. If there is only one card down at the table and a player throws a card with the same number, then a "snap" is achieved. A snap is worth 10 points. After all 6 cards of the first round are played, the two players receive another 6 cards. This is repeated a total of 4 times, until all cards are played. If, when all the cards are played there are still left cards at the table, the player who last achieved a winning deal collects them all. When the game is finished, the players count the points they have won. The player, who has collected more points, wins.
release_text: v1.6 New game selector v1.51 Counts points during play. v1.5 New scores layout. Better support for large screens. v1.4 Added German translation v1.3 Added settings page. User can configure whether vibration will be used, when a snap is achieved.

description: Download the awarded winbank mobile banking App of Piraeus Bank and manage your banking transactions easily & quickly even on the go. Through winbank mobile, you have access to a wide range of services and transactions: • Detailed portfolio view: Accounts, Cards, Loans, Time Deposits, Investment Products, Insurance Products. • Transfers to accounts in Piraeus Bank. • Issuance & Payment of e-Administrative Fee. • Issue instantly Virtual Prepaid Card, load/unload it. • Airtime Renewal for all mobile operators (Cosmote, Vodafone, Wind, Q Card). • Bill Payments: Credit Cards, Public Services, Telephony bills, etc. • Send Remittances to any other domestic Bank, or worldwide. • Buy/sell stocks and manage your stock portfolio. • Especially for corporate users: Check and approve other user’s orders. Service Tools: - Υou can activate quick login, a 4-digit PIN for easier and faster access to the App. - Easy access to winbank mycard App with all Piraeus Bank Cards offers. - Find and locate ATMs and Branches in maps. - Direct contact with Piraeus Bank, by email or phone. The application is available to all Piraeus Bank clients, individuals and corporates. To log-on, use the credentials for winbank web banking or the 4 digit PIN of quick login. If you don’t have the winbank web banking credentials, please visit any Piraeus Bank branch and get them immediately. For further information please contact us by: - Email: support@winbank.gr - Tel.: +30 210 3288000/18 28 38

description: Mathematik für Primarstufe Die Version schließt in 10 Kapiteln 120 mathematische Fertigkeiten und mehr als 1000 Aufgaben ein. Mathematik für die erste Klasse ist eines der umfassendsten Mathematik-Lehrwerke. Die Anwendung erfasst die folgenden Themen: - Zählen - Summierung - Subtraktion - Vergleichen der Zahlen - Schreib das richtige Symbol (Summierung und Subtraktion) - Daten und Uhrenzeit (Kalender, Digitaluhr und Analoguhr) - Pre-Algebra (Aufgaben mit Variablen) - Römische Ziffer - Gemischte Rechenaufgaben - Aufgaben Programm-Features - Kein Wi-Fi-Anschluß nötig - Zeitgeber läßt Aufgaben auf Zeit lösen - Zur nächsten/vorigen Aufgabe übergehen - Fünf verschiedenen Schwierigkeitsgrade der Aufgaben - Statistik gibt eine Möglichkeit, Fortschreiten des Kindes in jedem Abschnitt einzuschätzen. - Das Feld oben zeigt wie viele Aufgaben sind gelöst worden, dabei auch Zahl richtiger und falscher Antworten. - Man kann die falschen Antworten ändern. Diese Möglichkeit läßt Kindern die Fehler zu analysieren und zu korrigieren. - Punktezähler kann rückgesetzt werden. BENUTZER - Eltern der Grundschüler – für tägliche Hausaufgaben, Praktikum - Lehrer der Grundschule – im Unterricht - Schüler, die zu Hause lernen - Eltern – für Wiederholen der vorigen Klasse - Eltern – für Vorbereiten auf die folgende Klasse Vorteile - Möglichkeit, überall und in eigenem Tempo zu lernen - wunderbar im Unterricht und zu Hause - Diese Anwendung ist nicht nur eine Aufgabenbank. Das ist ein effektives Instrument des Selbstbildung und Fortschrittanalyse. - Der Inhalt entspricht den allgemeinen Bildungsstandarten. Stellen Sie das Programm selber ein! Schaffen Sie Ihre eigene Aufgabenset. Exakte Einstimmung führt zu einem effektiven Lernprozess. - Wählen Sie nötige Abschnitte - Fünf Schwierigkeitsgrade für jeden Abschnitt. - Man kann die Zahl der zu durcharbeitenden Aufgaben von „10“ bis „alle Aufgaben“ stellen. - Der Zeitgeber kann ab 2 Minuten bis “unbegrenzt” eingestellt werden Mehr Spaß - Abschnitte haben Bildchen - Lustige Signale für richtige und falsche Antworten - weiße Tafel (wunderbar für Pads!) Das Kind kann die weiße Tafel für die ganze Arbeit benutzen. Kinder können auf der weißen Tafel wie in einem Heft schreiben. Eltern können dem Kind auf der Tafel die Aufgabe erklären, es wird kein Papier verbraucht. Mach eine Pause, zeichne was! Wir beantworten gerne Ihre Fragen unter greenbutton75@gmail.com Wenn Sie das Programm vor Erwerb testen, wir bieten Ihnen eine kostenlose Version. Empfohlen für das Alter: 5-8 Jahre Mathematics for Primary The version includes 10 chapters in a 120 math skills and more than 1,000 tasks. Mathematics for the first class is one of the most comprehensive math textbooks. The application detects the following topics: - Counting - Summation - Subtraction - Compare the numbers - Write the correct symbol (summation and subtraction) - Data and clock time (calendar, digital clock and analog clock) - Pre-Algebra (tasks with variables) - Roman Numeral - Mixed arithmetic problems - Tasks Program Features - No Wi-Fi connection required - Timer can solve tasks on time - Skip to the next / previous job - Five different levels of difficulty of the tasks - Statistics are a way to assess progress of the child in each section. - The top field shows how many objects have been achieved, while also number correct and incorrect answers. - You can change the wrong answers. This option allows children to analyze and correct errors. - Points counter can be reset. USER - Parents of primary school children - for daily homework, internship - Teacher of elementary school - in the classroom - Students who learn at home - Parents - for repeating the previous class - Parents - Preparing for the following class Advantages - Opportunity to learn anywhere and at their own pace - Wonderful in the classroom and at home - This application is not just a job bank. This is an effective instrument of self-education and progress analysis. - The content meets the general education standards. Set the program itself! Create your own set of tasks. Exact conformity leads to an effective learning process. - Select required sections - Five levels of difficulty for each section. - You can set up the number of tasks to be fulfilled by "10" "all tasks". - The timer can be set from 2 minutes to "unlimited" More fun - Sections have little pictures - Funny signals for correct and incorrect answers - White board (great for pads!) The child can use the white board for all the work. Children can write on the white board as in a book. Parents can explain to the child on the table the task, there is no paper consumed. Take a break, what to draw! We are happy to answer your questions greenbutton75@gmail.com When you test the program before purchase, we offer a free version. Recommended for ages: 5-8 years

Lines is a simple puzzle game. Connect matching colors to create a line. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle in Lines Free. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap! 2000 puzzles from 5x5 to 12x12 !

Looking for where to eat, shop, or play in Ottawa? Nearest gas station, hotel, Tim Horton's, Wal-Mart, banks, ATMs, etc. Or just searching for the beautiful landmarks and attractions near by? Ottawa Guide gives you location-based access to all these and more: access to all the businesses from Yellow Pages, and all the landmarks and attractions in Ottawa. Ottawa Guide combines augmented reality and location based technology to provide you with a fun and rich experience of Ottawa, Canada. Features: * Location-based access to all the businesses on Yellow Pages. * An augmented reality view of the landmarks and attraction nearby. * Current and future weather information of Ottawa.

This live changing wallpaper application will let you see many of the places you will (InshAllah) go to when you perform Hajj. Places included are: Makkah, Madina, Uhud, Muzdalifah, and Mina. All wallpaper images are very high resolution. The wallpaper changes at an interval that you specify by tapping the Settings button and selecting how often you want the wallpaper to change to a different one. The photos for the wallpapers are actual places from Hajj that were taken in 2007. Features: * High quality photo images. * Wallpaper changing On/Off. * Set how often the wallpaper changes. Note: This app contains very high resolution images. Please make dua for my family and I. Please comment and review this application. Please consider a sadaqa donation because I have been unemployed since Nov 2009. You can contact me via email. I'm also available to do custom Android apps and VB.Net apps if you wish to hire me as an employee. Wasalamu, Emad-ud-deen
release_text: Alhamdulillah, I'm very happy all you you enjoy this app. With the permission of Allah (swt) I did this app because I wanted one like it for my phone and tablet and could not find anything like it on the market. :-) The photos were taken with a high res Canon powershot camera. app_name: 3K Legend - เกมแอ็คชั่นสามก๊ก
description: แนะนำเกม "3K Legend"เป็นผลงานเกมมือถือครั้งยิ่งใหญ่ที่อิงมาจากศึกประวัติศาสตร์สามก๊กสุดอมตะ ในโลกแห่งเกมที่สรรสร้างขึ้นจากเอกลักษณ์ที่โดดเด่นของแม่ทัพแต่ละคน ด้วยประสิทธิภาพของระบบQTEใหม่เอี่ยม ทำให้ปล่อยสกิลฉูดฉาดบาดตา แตกค่ายทลายศัตรูได้ง่ายๆแม้ในยามวิกฤติ！ "ผู้เล่นสามารถรับสมัครและดูแลวีรบุรุษสามก๊กที่หาตัวจับยาก, เปิดศึกกับกองกำลังมอนสเตอร์,BOSSดันเจี้ยนหรือแม้กระทั่งกับผู้เล่นด้วยกันเอง, ฝังอัญมณีอันแยบคาย, คุมสถานการณ์ในสนามรบเพื่อพิชิตชัยชนะ,ตั้งค่ายทัพให้สมบูรณ์ แสดงศักยภาพของแม่ทัพเต็มขั้น จงสร้างวีรบุรุษนักรบที่เป็นของตัวคุณเองเพื่อเป็นหนึ่งในใต้หล้า! " เนื้อเรื่อง ยุคปลายราชวงศ์ฮั่นตะวันออก จักรพรรดิทรงอ่อนแอ ขันทีมีอำนาจเป็นใหญ่ในแผ่นดิน ข้าราชการทุจริตฉ้อราษฎร์บังหลวง ก่อความเดือดร้อนแก่ชาวบ้านทุกครัวเรือน ขุนศึกหัวเมืองต่าง ๆ พากันกระด้างกระเดื่องและตั้งกองกำลังส่วนตัวขึ้น กลุ่มอิทธิพลต่าง ๆ ทำสงครามแย่งชิงอำนาจกันโดยไม่สนใจรัฐบาลกลาง 　ตั๋งโต๊ะบุตรชายข้าหลวงเมืองหลงซี รับการแต่งตั้งเป็นเจ้าครองนครและเข้าแทรกแซงการทำงานของขุนนาง ใช้วิธีการโหดร้ายไร้ความปราณี ราษฎรต่างประสบความทุกข์เข็ญพร่ำวอนให้แคว้นต่างๆรวมกันเป็นหนึ่งเดียวเพื่อชีวิตที่สงบสุข ด้วยเหตุนี้เหล่าผู้กล้าผู้มีปณิธานมุ่งมั่นจึงรวมกลุ่มกันกำจัดตั๋งโต๊ะ 　　เรื่องราวของ"3K LEGEND"เริ่มต้น ณ จุดนี้ ผู้เล่นทั้งหลายจงให้แม่ทัพฝึกยุทธ จัดวางตำแหน่งให้ดี ขจัดตั๋งโต๊ะ สู้ลิโป้ ปราบโจโฉ คืนสันติภาพสู่ใต้หล้า สำเร็จเป็นหนึ่งได้ดั่งใจหวัง ลักษณะพิเศษของเกม 2Dเสมือนจริงสุดปราณีต：ฉากสู้รบตระการตา，เอฟเฟคสกิลสุดเท่ห์，ฉากสามก๊กแท้ๆบวกขุนพลที่มีสไตล์ของตัวเองกว่าพันชีวิต ออกแบบขุนพลให้มีบุคลิกเฉพาะตัว：สกิลขุนพลหลากหลายสะท้อนให้เห็นเอกลักษณ์ที่แตกต่าง อีกทั้งอาวุธเฉพาะตัว เหล่านี้ทำให้ขุนพลของคุณโดดเด่นไม่ซ้ำใคร ในสถานการณ์ต่างๆที่ปล่อยสกิลคุณจะได้เห็นลูกไม้แพรวพราวที่เปลี่ยนไปเรื่อยๆของจอมยุทธแต่ละคน！ ออกแบบการต่อสู้เป็นเอกลักษณ์：ลงมือง่ายดาย ตีแรงสะใจ โจมตีต่อเนื่องหลายสกิล โชว์เอฟเฟคพิเศษขั้นเทพ การต่อสู้ของคุณจะไม่น่าเบื่ออีกต่อไป เชิญเพื่อนรักมาร่วมศึกสามก๊ก：บอกลาความโดดเดี่ยวในโลกแห่งสามก๊ก เชิญเพื่อนมารับรางวัลด้วยกัน ฝึกฝนเร็วจี๋เพื่อส่งคุณขึ้นแท่นอันดับหนึ่ง！ นอกจากนี้เรายังมีจุดเด่นอีก5ข้อ： กิจกรรมมากมาย: เข้าเกมแล้วรับของขวัญใหญ่ทันที เติมเงินครั้งแรกรับรางวัล2เท่าไปเลย Side- scrolling turn-based: ปล่อยท่าไม้ตายได้เพียงปลายนิ้วสัมผัส ปะทะมอนสเตอร์กับBOSSแต่ละตัว PKให้มันส์กันไปเลย เรื่องราวสะเทือนใจ: รักสามเส้าระหว่างเตียวเสี้ยน,ตั๋งโต๊ะ,ลิโป้ เป็นต้นเหตุของเรื่องราวทั้งหมด รีบไปช่วยศิษย์น้องหญิงกันเถอะ ขุนพลดังเข้าสนามรบ: รับขุนพลสามก๊กกว่าพันคน รวมพลต่อสู้ด้วยค่ายกลที่แยบคาย พากันไปKoในลานประลอง ชิงบัลลังค์ฮ่องเต้: ผู้ชนะสูงสุดย่อมเป็นราชันย์ ขุนนางบู๊บุ๋นคุกเข่ากราบหน้าท้องพระโรง สาวงามมากมายรอท่านที่วังหลัง app_name: Ninja Coming - นินจาโฮคาเงะ
description: 《 NIinja Coming 》เกมมือถือสุดยอดRPGนินจาโฮคาเงะปฐมบทแรกแห่งปี2014 ใช้บทตัวละครจากอภิมหาการ์ตูนสุดฮิตเหล่าผู้กล้านินจาแห่งโฮคาเงะ เมื่อ9หางรุกรานโคโนฮะ สู่ฉากเริ่มเรื่องของโฮคาเงะ ตะลุยผ่านเรื่องราวภารกิจนับร้อยและดันเจี้ยนมากมาย เรียกคู่หู ร่วมกับซากุระ ซาสึเกะสร้างทีมคาคาชิไม่ใช่ฝันไป หรือการพบและร่วมต่อสู่ไปกับเหล่าฮีโร่ในดวงใจมิใช่เรื่องที่ลมๆแล้งๆอีกต่อไป ยาลับ มนต์สะกด อักขระ คาถาเทพ วิธีมากมายที่จะเสริมพลัง ท้าประลองสนามแข่งขัน มาพิสูจน์กันว่าใครเก่งที่สุด เป้าหมายมีเพียงหนึ่ง นินจาอันดับหนึ่งผู้แกร่งสุด——โฮคาเงะ เนื้อเรื่อง อิงตามเค้าโครงเดิม นับแต่9หางถูกปลดปล่อย โฮคาเงะรุ่น4ทำการผนึก9หาง ในเกมนี้ผู้เล่นจะรับบทเป็นนินจา คอยช่วยเหลือนารูโตะให้เติบโตขึ้น ขณะเดียวกันก็ทำการสร้างทีมให้แข็งแกร่งขึ้นด้วย เป้าหมายสูงสุดอยู่ที่การเป็นนินจาที่เก่งที่สุด——โฮคาเงะ ในโลกของนินจามีอิทธิพลชั่วร้ายมากมาย ก้าวสู่เส้นทางข้างหน้าต้องเพิ่มพลังต่อสู้ให้ตนเอง ยังมีคู่หูอีกนับพันรอร่วมสายสัมพันธ์กับคุณอยู่ จุดเด่นเกม 【โฮคาเงะแท้ คู่หูนับร้อยผนึกกำลัง】 　　รวบรวมตัวละครโฮคาเงะนับร้อย เริ่มจากทีมของนารูโตะ ซาสึเกะ ซากุระ คาคาชิ จนถึงบทตัวละครกิ๊กก๊อก ตัวNPCหรือแม้กระทั่งมอนสเตอร์ทั้งหลายจะปรากฎสู่จอเกม รับรองว่าคุณจะพบตัวละครทุกตัวที่อยู่ในการ์ตูน 【เหตุการณ์รบดุเดือดสะใจ เกินบรรยายด้วยคำพูด】 　　ฉากต่อสู้ถือเป็นจุดสำคัญของเกม ใช้โหมดตัวละคร3D เอฟเฟคต่อสู้แสดงผลละเอียด ภาพคมชัดงดงาม ทีมงานยังออกแบบเอฟเฟคท่าไม้ตายที่เป็นหนึ่งไม่มีสอง ตัวละครมากมายกับ1สกิลจนจบเรื่องในโหมดเก่าๆจะไม่กลับมาอีก สัมผัสดุเดือดเผ็ดมันส์อย่างนี้ คุณจะไม่ลองหน่อยหรือ? 【เนื้อเรื่องเข้มข้น สัมผัสเสมือนจริง】 　　เกมRPGรูปแบบเข้มข้น ด้านภารกิจก็ออกแบบได้ไม่น้อยหน้า ภารกิจทั้งหมดบนตัวเกมมีมากมายและแสนง่าย จำนวนภารกิจที่ให้ทำเยอะจนต้องตะลึง ส่วนภารกิจรองจะไม่ทำให้คุณรู้สึกยุ่งยากกังวลใจเลยแม้แต่นิดเดียว ที่สำคัญ ในระบบหลัก จะอัพเดทภารกิจและดันเจี้ยนใหม่ตลอด เพื่อให้คุณเล่นเกมไปด้วยและสนุกกับเนื้อเรื่องไปด้วย เว็บไซต์： http://naruto.lemongame.net Fanpage： http://www.facebook.com/Naruto.Lemon E-mail： GM@lemongame.net Line：Lemongame "NIinja Coming" ultimate mobile game Ninja RPG Hokage first chapter of the year 2014. description: Try to reach the end of the sky by flying with Air Balloon. This is very funny and endless game, where you collect money for another chance during the trip, and also trying to get higher and higher.

Play2Focus **Update** Google Tasks sync ************************************************************ Swipe! And Play your tasks just like your music app. Play2Focus, shows your priorities of tasks on your smartphone perfectly. Sometimes you have to face difficulties of managing your todo-list Unexpected issues rush you frequently and it's not easy to update the todo-list every-day, every-hour. Every GTD app requires users to update and modify due-dates one by one. You have to open calendar and reschedule the deadline. It bothers you and if you skip this step the GTD app will just show you wrong list on your screen. That is one of the references to develop our new GTD app, Play2Focus. It is designed to revise your order of priorities and status of tasks very easily through just simple swipe gestures. It makes you to focus on the most important task only without any diffusion because Play2Focus’ adjusting main screen reflects your actual priorities of tasks by itself. How to use Play2Focus. It is very simple. If you want to do something now, just ‘Play’ this task and focus on it. You want to postpone it now? Then just swipe left to 'Pause' and focus on it later. Features - Intuitive swipe gestures. To the left or to the right. (Swiping further, it will show you a different action) - Simple status You can play, pause and complete your tasks instantly. No other complicated things needed. - Easy to recognize Customizable (color, icon, and name) and visualized context enables you to distinguish the purpose and priorities of your tasks immediately. You will never have experienced a task manager like this! Download Play2Focus now and get a whole new level of GTD application.

description: Solution- Pearson Teacher’s App offers the latest teaching resources for educators in Hong Kong. In addition to providing general educational news and subject’s news, it also offers a lot of interactive teaching tools. Besides, teachers can register Pearson activities or seminars instantly through the app. Features • provide relevant subject’s news and personalised information • offer digital catalogue and corresponding video • instant registration of activities and seminars • share news via mail, Whatsapp or Facebook

Hong Kong Taxi Cards - Previously Collaborative Hong Kong Taxi Translator - Android Version !!! With over 9,000 Hong Kong addresses translated into written Chinese and Cantonese, equipped with function to request for additional addresses and get feedback very quickly, this is not an ordinary dictionary type translator app. If you are non-Cantonese speaking visitor or resident to Hong Kong, this app will definitely helps, especially when you need to take taxi. Features: * Search addresses * Browse addresses by categories ( e.g. Tourist Attractions, Hotels, MTR stations ) * Show flashcard for taxi drivers * Able request for additional addresses translation * Provide very fast feedback on requests * Learn Cantonese addresses by phonetic Cantonese * Bookmark addresses * Send addresses as email, whatsapp * No Internet required * Big & updated database (>9,000 addresses) * Accurate translation (reviewed by Hong Kong locals) This app is designed as a platform to provide addresses translation in a collaborative way. Users are expected to enjoy comprehensive database, and able to request and contribute to the database. For whose who have tried the request function, we believed you truly understanding what this app could uniquely provide to you. You just don't have to worry about the database coverage. [= We are happy to see that our app does help =] HK: Great ***** by Nono1961 - Version 1.4 - Sep 29, 2013 Excellent apps, efficient and updated with new addresses on demand... And now my iphone speak cantonese :) Thank you UK: Extremely helpful! ***** by Rodders693 - Version 1.2 - Sep 4, 2013 Just moved into a new building that's not on the translator, emailed a request- sorted within a day! Brilliant! Thanks guys! Germany: Fantastic App! ***** by chbrink - Version 1.2 - Aug 24, 2013 Very nice app with a big update database and very quick feedback on address requests! [ === About This App === ] This one have - comprehensive & dynamic database - request function with quick feedback [ ==== Functions in details ===== ] * Address Translation This app translates address into Chinese and phonetic Cantonese. Just show the Chinese flash card to taxi drivers, it solves the language problem. You could also try to pronounce an address in Cantonese using the phonetic Cantonese. * Request Additional Address Function Do not find the address you look for ? Easy, use the 'request for translation' function. Just submit your request, we are happy to add it for you very quickly. More importantly, the updates could be retrieved by a single click on the updates button. Other users would also enjoy the updates as well. Also, you could report error on address, and we would correct the data. * One Click Updates Whenever you start the app, it will automatically check for new address updates from our servers. Just one single click could keep your database up-to-date. * Share to email or whatsapp You could send the address to your friend by the "share to" function * Offline Usage This app could works offline except the first-time data install and the map function. [ === About Translation Request Status === ] After you made a request, you could click on the 'Request' button again to check the status. It would show the request status, e.g. "Added. Please check the updates button ( shown an icon on it - "NEW" )." After you click the updates button, the requested address would automatically update onto your database.

香港地區天氣 - Shows Hong Kong district weather information according to your current location. - All weather information is provided by Hong Kong Observatory with authorization - Most of the improvements are based on your comments, so feel free to rate and leave some comment for me ^_^ - If you have questions and want me to answer, please feel free to email / facebook me, as there is no way for me to answer if you put your questions in market's comment [FAQ] - App2SD? Will not have app2SD as if enabled, widgets and notification will fail. This is Android's design. - Background color? can be set in settings, you can see the samples in the screenshot session - different screen size? I will try my best to add different screen size support, as there are too many. - Widgets fail to auto update? Try to go into that widget's setting and press back OR re-add the widget - Location not accurate? the location is the closest HKO station, may not be the district name that you are currently in
