The Two Guys Garage tv show was America's first in automotive how-to television, starting out in 1992 as Shadetree Mechanic. and now you can take the your favorite episodes with you on the go! Download the free Two Guys Garage app and get access to Past Episodes of Two Guys Garage, as well as current season. Plus, you will rec great deals and information from the companies showcasing their products on the show.

Colorado Speedway is Colorado's only NASCAR sanctioned race track. Auto racing in Colorado at it's finest since 1965. The CNS mobile app features: - Push notifications for breaking news from the track - LIVE Updates from the track - Track info and driving directions - Schedule of events - Track News - Tech News - Race Results - Point Standings - Videos - Image Gallery And much, much more! This FREE app will keep you closer to the action at Colorado National Speedway like never before.

Picturesque mountains, silence of the forest, karst caves and rocks, the beauty of lakes and rivers... The Cycling Trail of Gorski kotar is a new cycling trail linking up the natural, historic, cultural and culinary attraction in towns and municipalities of this delightful mountainous region. The trail meanders along the old and little used forest tracks and paths and will be to the taste of those who seek virgin nature and can tackle rather demanding terrain… Our trail allows you to experience the entire area of Gorski kotar in several stages – planning your cycling holiday day by day. There are 7 stages ranging from 28-43 km with a total distance of 260 km. With the addition of 9 branch routes it totals an impressive 400 km of unique enjoyment on two wheels specially designed to feature more than 5000 m in climbs and descents. Gorski kotar Bike will enable you to: - find trails, stages or short trips - GPS navigation, so you don't get lost - display your ride statistics - find out more about top attractions - look for accommodation - restaurants and catering establishments - tourist offices - service information This is our inital release, we are already working on further enhancements.

description: Simple timer for martial Arts and interval training. This application is very useful for boxing, karate, mma, high intensity interval training, functional training, etc. No ads and additional functions in Pro version: Train Hard Pro You can manage your working and resting time list (add and delete time). The application sounds: - one gong at the start of the round. - two gongs at the end of the round. - five gongs at the end for the work. Comment: - The application contains ads (banner, notification and icon). Some antivirus applications identify it as virus. Enjoy and train hard...

ATG (Android Transmission GUI) is an application which helps you to manage your torrent files on your remote transmission client from your Android device. Transmission ( http://www.transmissionbt.com ) is a BitTorrent client which is wildly used on NAS/PC/HTPC etc. for file sharing. It has its own WEB based interface, but it is hard to use on a mobile device. The Web interface has to be enabled on your transmission client! Short function list: - Supports secure (HTTPS) transmission clients. (In WIFI network use DNS name instead of IP address because the enabled DNS relay option of the WIFI rooter can slow down your communication). - Automatic view refresh - Multiple transmission client configuration support - Multiple RSS feed configuration support - Integrated torrent search - Support for file copy/download from remote transmission client to phone SD card via FTP/SFTP/SCP protocol - Restartable failed downloads - Upload torrents + by giving the torrent URL + using “share link” option in your browser + from rss feed + from torrent search result + using "send file" in a file manager - Magnet link support - Add RSS feed URLs using browser "share link" option - Start/Stop/remove/remove and delete torrents - Pause/Start all - Separated horizontally scrollable views for all/active/paused/downloading/seeding torrent files - Torrent lists can be ordered by Torrent name/size/upload date - Torrent list can be filtered by name - Torrent detail view with charts - Session statistic view with charts - Temporary speed limit support ATG makes it easy to do the usual staffs such as uploading/stopping/removing/starting torrent files and provides a user friendly interface to follow your file downloading/uploading processes, session statistics, current uploading/downloading speeds etc.. In this ATG version the following features are implemented: RSS feed support: You can configure RSS feed URLs on the setting view as many as you want or you can add them using the browser "share link" option. When you want to check one of them you can choose the RSS site from a menu. The result is displayed in a list from where you can start the download process or navigate to the detail page on the RSS feed provider site, by using the common context menu. Download to microsd card: You can copy the downloaded files from your remote/home device to your mobile device SD card via FTP/SFTP/SCP protocols. The remote device must support these protocols. You can download all the files that belong to the torrent file or you can choose them one by one from a list and start the copying. Failed copies can be restarted.
release_text: 1.31 You can set torrent priority. Go to torrent detail, choose menu - Operations - Set priority 1.30 Two more torrent search sites have been added. 1.29 Isohunt search plugin was replaced because the site was closed. 1.28 minor bug fixes 1.27 No more "Phone Calls" permission needed. In 1.25 version I tried an other ad network (mobclix) which needed it. 1.26 Fixes temporary speed limit setting problem. 1.25 Fixes RSS feed problem, when torrent could not be uploaded.

description: Let's have a little cleanup! Derby is a marvelous little logic game where you have to make order on the game field. The color of every pebble in the columns must match the color of the one in the bottom column. To give the game a little spin, yo can only use the knight move (you know, the L shaped thingy) from the chess when swapping two pebbles. The quick, but challenging gameplay makes this gem ideal during everyday commuting (unless you are the driver), waiting for someone (or simply making others waiting for you), or you tell me where you play your games. But enough talk, let's give it a spin!
release_text: 3.2: - Service updates and bugfixes 3.0.1: - Minor hotfixes 3.0: - Brand new game mode: Time Game! - Google Play Games integration with achievements and online leaderboards - Polished user interface - Brand new game themes - Several bugfixes and improvements

description: Puli Space Technologies is a Hungarian company that aims to land a self-made probe on the Moon by 2016 and thus complete the Google Lunar XPRIZE challenge. This App is to introduce the team, aslo containing articles and publications on the Moon and Hungarian space explorations, an interactive map of the Moon, and a 'secret' game. Explore the Moon and find the game!

Istanbul Audio Travel Guide Istanbul offers more than the perfect blend of European and Asian culture; beyond the bustling market bazaars, beautiful ancient mosques, ornate Ottoman houses our tours let you discover the city that never sleeps: whether you are looking for insights into the city’s fascinating history or just wanting to take strolls along the Bosporus waterfront and find the wide range of culinary offerings from the traditional fish-restaurants to the trendy bars and pulsating nightclubs. For first impressions try our sample tour for Sultanahmet. PocketGuide, the world’s leading audio city guide application, gives you tours by voice, revealing the best stories, insider hangouts and must-see sights in close to 100 major cities and tourist destinations. The app determines your location and a recording of your personal tour guide describes where you are – you don’t need to touch your phone or read from the screen. All the tours are developed by local experts who know their cities inside-and-out. You can choose from different themed tours, or just wander around the city and let PocketGuide inform you when an interesting site is nearby. The app can also record your trip: With one click you can create an amazing 3D video of the sights you see on your travels. You can use the GPS-activated voice tours for free as long as your phone is online, but that means you will have to pay roaming charges. If you pay to download the tours, you can use them offline, and save on the cost of roaming. We charge a small fee for downloading the offline features because we need to reimburse the tour guides and cover our development costs. Other features you can get for free include a map that works offline and free use of the 3D tour. Why PocketGuide? • TOURS OFFERED BY LOCAL EXPERTS - Browse more than 400 tours guided by people who make sure you see the most exciting places. • AUDIO GUIDED TOURS - It will guide you with clear audio cues and once you approach a sight it automatically starts to tell you about it • SHARE YOUR EXPERIENCES - During your tour you can take photos and add comments; from this PocketGuide automatically creates a 3D video which you can easily share with your friends • FIND GREAT PLACES - If you are tired, let our guides recommend you the best nearby restaurants and cafés • AVAILABLE OFFLINE - Once you download a city, the whole content works in offline mode so you don’t have to pay roaming charges • OFFLINE MAP - Get a free offline map and navigate in the city easily while avoiding roaming charges. Enjoyed the tours? Keep on traveling? Download PocketGuide's other versions available in other cities.
release_text: Application made fully compatible with Android Marshmallow. Accessing the side menu made easier allowing faster navigation. The new Sightseeing City Map is introduced! Feel free to discover the main sights in an order you wish with this new set of POIs. Download the package on the City Screen. Preparing for first use? Check out our brand new Tutorial and learn the app in 5 easy steps.

All the tours are developed by local experts who know their cities inside-and-out. You can choose from different themed tours, or just wander around the city and let PocketGuide inform you when an interesting site is nearby. The app can also record your trip: With one click you can create an amazing 3D video of the sights you see on your travels. You can use the GPS-activated voice tours for free as long as your phone is online, but that means you will have to pay roaming charges. If you pay to download the tours, you can use them offline, and save on the cost of roaming. We charge a small fee for downloading the offline features because we need to reimburse the tour guides and cover our development costs. Other features you can get for free include a map that works offline and free use of the 3D tour. Why PocketGuide? • TOURS OFFERED BY LOCAL EXPERTS - Browse more than 400 tours guided by people who make sure you see the most exciting places. • AUDIO GUIDED TOURS - It will guide you with clear audio cues and once you approach a sight it automatically starts to tell you about it • SHARE YOUR EXPERIENCES - During your tour you can take photos and add comments; from this PocketGuide automatically creates a 3D video which you can easily share with your friends • FIND GREAT PLACES - If you are tired, let our guides recommend you the best nearby restaurants and cafés • AVAILABLE OFFLINE - Once you download a city, the whole content works in offline mode so you don’t have to pay roaming charges • OFFLINE MAP - Get a free offline map and navigate in the city easily while avoiding roaming charges. Enjoyed the tours? Keep on traveling? Download PocketGuide's other versions available in other cities.

Slice HD is a sinister puzzle game for your Android device. The goal of the game is to clear layers of very sharp blades to push the red button. Push all the buttons in order and you win. While trying to open the puzzle you must not touch the sharp edges of the blades or you will get SLICED. When this happens, blood spills from your finger(s) onto the glass and the puzzle will reset. The blades only move in specific patterns that you must intuit by touch. Often, you must use multiple fingers to hold blades open while you manipulate other blades with other fingers. This game is really about trying to figure out the hidden behaviours of the blades and moving the blades out of the way, carefully. Great party game and a GREAT tablet game!

description: The zero-project Ring Kit allows you to create musical playlists and assign these as your phone's main ringtone or as the ringtones for specific contacts. To make life even easier for you, this sophisticated ringtone manager comes with an selection of 11 atmospheric ringtones by zero-project. Usage Imagine you have a number of albums in different folders on your phone. With just a few button presses you can assign an album to be the ringtone playlist for one of your contacts. Now when you get a call from this contact, a song from the album will play. When the same contact calls again Ring Kit retrieves the second song in the playlist so that over time as you receive further phone calls, you'll hear each of the album's songs. A tutorial describing Ring Kit's features is available at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N0jF8dTKe-Q Features Integrates seamlessly with Android so that you can: - assign a default ringtone playlist or - set up playlists for individual contacts. - see at a glance the playlists that are assigned to your contacts. Enables you to create and edit multiple ringtone playlists by: - adding to a playlist one song at a time, - scanning a folder on your phone to add multiple songs and - reordering your music using drag 'n drop. There is also a premium version of this app. The zero-project Ring Kit Pro includes the following functions: - randomising a playlist's order, - configuring the number of times each song is used as a ringtone before assigning a different track, - exporting the bundled zero-project tracks for inclusion in your own playlists and in other apps, The zero-project Ring Kit Pro also comes with 20 additional ringtones and allow you to upgrade easily without losing any of your playlists and ringtone assignments from the free app. If you have any suggestions or bug reports please feel free to e-mail me. Credits All of the bundled ringtones are samples of tracks in albums that have been released by zero-project ( http://www.zero-project.gr/ ) under the "Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License" ( http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ )
release_text: 1.24 * Improved handling of RIFF files 1.23 * Ringtone picker handles app quits and restart better * Fixes possible crash in Exports screen on older Android versions * Progress now displayed during playlist update * Bundled playlist now displays correctly after fast scroll * Exports screen orders songs by filename * Fixes possible NullPointerException and leaking cursors when app runs first * Possible fix for incorrect display in main screen * Now only prompts user about import in pro version

description: The zero-project Ring Kit Pro allows you to create musical playlists and assign these as your phone's main ringtone or as the ringtones for specific contacts. To make life even easier for you, this sophisticated ringtone manager comes with an excellent selection of 31 atmospheric ringtones by zero-project. Usage Imagine you have a number of albums in different folders on your phone. With just a few button presses you can assign an album to be the ringtone playlist for one of your contacts. Now when you get a call from this contact, a song from the album will play. When the same contact calls again Ring Kit Pro retrieves the second song in the playlist so that over time as you receive further phone calls, you'll hear each of the album's songs. A tutorial describing most of Ring Kit Pro's features is available at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N0jF8dTKe-Q Features Integrates seamlessly with Android so that you can: - assign a default ringtone playlist or - set up playlists for individual contacts. - see at a glance the playlists that are assigned to your contacts. Enables you to create and edit multiple ringtone playlists by: - adding to a playlist one song at a time, - scanning a folder on your phone to add multiple songs and - reordering your music using drag 'n drop. In addition to the features listed above, Ring Kit Pro allows you to: - randomize a playlist's order, - configure the number of times a song is used as a ringtone before assigning a different track either on a per-playlist basis or across the app as a whole, - export the bundled zero-project tracks for inclusion in your own playlists and in other apps, - smoothly upgrade from the free Ring Kit app, retaining all your favourite playlists and ringtone assignments. If you have any suggestions or bug reports please feel free to e-mail me. Credits All of the bundled ringtones are samples of tracks in albums that have been released by zero-project ( http://www.zero-project.gr ) under the "Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License" ( http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ )

The Caravan is a horror/action/adventure graphic novel in the trend of 'From Dusk till Dawn' and '30 Days of Night'. It contains 85 pages copiously coated with spicy Bollywood masala that will make you smack your lips with the taste of bloody curry! Written by Shamik Dasgupta who also wrote the highly acclaimed Ramayana 3392 A.D., this is a work that looks like a combined effort of Tarantino from Hollywood and the Ramsays from Bollywood, The Caravan is a high octane treat with a sprinkle of comedy. We are sure it would sink its teeth into you and keep you enthralled. The app allows you to read The Caravan at a price much less than that of the hard print. In the app, you can read the graphic novel either in panel mode (for small screen devices) or in page mode (for tablets). Do rate this app and if you like the work please do help in spreading the word around. Plot summary of The Caravan: For ages a coven of vampires travel the deserts of Rajasthan under the guise of a Caravan of Nautanki or a Gypsy Circus. They lure the unsuspecting villagers to invite them to perform and through the course of the night feed on every living soul. Their heinous deeds go undetected for years, possibly even centuries until a boy named Asif survives their attack. Years later the boy grows up to be a smuggler across the border, and on afateful day he gets arrested. Jai, the custodian cop and Asif get stranded in the desert and find shelter in a fort run by border security force and their volatile and violent Officer in Charge, Daroga Bhairo Singh. As night creeps forth, the caravan of vampires appear once again on the horizon. Asif becomes terrified and tries to warn them but no one believes him. Instead, mesmerized by the glamour of the Nautanki, they make the fatal mistake of inviting them to the fort. What follows is a night drenched in blood as the vampires begin their massacre. Asif has escaped the Caravan once, but can he pull off that impossible trick again?

description: Random Password Generator A good password can mean the difference between identify safety and identity theft. Unfortunately, too many otherwise intelligent people rely on ridiculously weak passwords. Random Password Generator for Android can create highly secure passwords and keys that are extremely difficult to crack, with a customizable combination of alphabets, numbers and symbol characters. The built-in Password Strength Checker is designed to assess the strength of password strings. The instantaneous visual feedback provides you a means to improve the strength of your passwords, with a hard focus on breaking the typical bad habits of faulty password formulation. AdFree Features: • No Advertisements • No Internet permissions Features: • Batch Generator: Generate hundreds or thousands of passwords with one touch • Strength Checker: How strong is your password? • Single Password Generator: Need just one password? This mode generated 10 random passwords and selects the strongest one from the batch • Random Number Generator: Generate a random number • Full control over numbers, symbols and uppercase/lowercase alphabet, length and number of passwords generated. • Phonetics with ten different phonetic alphabet sets • Copy passwords to the clipboard • Export passwords to your SD card / External memory or email the list

புதுமைப்பித்தன், Pudhumai Pithan is the pseudonym of C. Viruthachalam, one of the most influential and revolutionary writers of Tamil fiction. His active writing period was less than 15 years (1934–46) in which he wrote nearly 100 short stories, an equal number of essays on a variety of subjects, 15 poems, a few plays and scores of book reviews. His writings gave him a reputation as a maverick. Some of his short stories are listed in this app. Looking forward for your comments and feedback.

Have you ever wished for a stock ticker for Android, just like the one on TV? Your wish has been granted! Get My Stock Ticker and stay updated with the latest Stock Quotes in Real Time*. ## This is an advanced live wallpaper ## ## Read important install instructions at the end before installing ## *** Supports phones and tablets *** *** Supports portrait and landscape modes *** *** Supports custom launchers (like Go Launcher EX, ADW Launcher, etc. ) *** *** Multiple resolutions supported *** Optimized to use very less (<100 kb) internet data and maximize battery life Features: - Add unlimited stocks - Real-time stock updates - Set update interval to anywhere from 15 seconds to 15 mins - Adjustable tracker speed from Slow to Very Fast - Place the tracker bar anywhere on the screen, with just a tap - Following stock exchanges supported North America NYSE New York Stock Exchange NASDAQ The NASDAQ Stock Market, Inc. (Lite Version) AMEX American Stock Exchange OTC FINRA OTC Bulletin Board PINK FINRA OTC Bulletin Board TSE Toronto Stock Exchange CVE Toronto TSX Ventures Exchange OPRA Option Chains Europe LON London Stock Exchange (Lite Version) FRA Deutsche Börse Frankfurt Stock Exchange ETR Deutsche Börse XETRA BIT Borsa Italiana Milan Stock Exchange EPA NYSE Euronext Paris EBR NYSE Euronext Brussels ELI NYSE Euronext Lisbon AMS NYSE Euronext Amsterdam Asia BOM Bombay Stock Exchange Limited NSE National Stock Exchange of India (Lite Version) SHA Shanghai Stock Exchange (Lite Version) SHE Shenzhen Stock Exchange TPE Taiwan Stock Exchange HKG Hong Kong Stock Exchange TYO Tokyo Stock Exchange (Lite Version) South Pacific ASX Australian Securities Exchange NZE New Zealand Stock Exchange * Real time stock quotes subject to specific exchange. Mail any queries, suggestions and feedback to hypr[dot]geek[at]gmail[dot]com Usage Policy: http://www.hyprgeek.com/usage.txt Permissions: Internet/Network State: Get stock quotes and Google Play Billing Important Instructions: ** 1. This is a live wallpaper, On Home Screen, press Menu > Wallpaper > Live Wallpapers, or long press on Home Screen > Wallpapers > Live Wallpapers ** 2. Let the wallpaper load in preview mode, Tapping "Set Wallpaper" before it loads might result in a Force close. ** 3. If such a situation happens (force close) and wallpaper turns black, just goto Wallpaper Settings (On Home Screen, press Menu > Wallpaper > Configure) and exit the settings screen, the wallpaper will display right. ** 4. On tablets, if the default mode is landscape, portrait mode might have a skewed tracker bar. It is recommended to switch off home screen orientation change or set the wallpaper in portrait orientation and then switch to landscape. ** 5. In case of custom launchers, sometimes stock quotes might seem mispositioned when switching orientation. It will correct by itself when the stock quotes get updated. In case of any glitches/bugs, please contact us through e-mail, or state it in the comments. It will immensely help us identify and resolve it.

description: Tired of listening to that Samsung Galaxy S4 user who brags about air control features. Well BE A NINJA!!! Air Gesture Control is your answer to them ! ! ! Now With Gallery and Call Features with PRO version WINNER at INTEL CodeFest 2013 Air Control allows you to control following features: 1. Music - Control your music player using Air Gesture Control - Place and remove your hand (Hover) to play music - Place and remove your hand (Hover) again to pause music - Wave once to play Next song - Wave twice to play Previous song 2. Unlock Screen - Control your phone screen UnLock using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to UnLock your screen 3. Record Audio - Record audio data using Air Gesture Control - Place and remove your hand to start recording Audio - Place and remove your hand again to Stop recording Audio - Your recorded file would inside /sdcard/AirGestureControl/DateTime.mp3 4. Push Ups - Select PushUp check box using Air Gesture Control - Place your phone below your chest and start doing PushUps - When done with workout, remove PushUp check box 5. Flash Light (Torch) - Control your phone Flash Light using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on Flash light(Torch) - Place and remove your hand again to switch off Flash light(Torch) 6. Ringer Volume (Silent mode) - Control your phone volume using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to Silent phone - Place and remove your hand again to Ringer mode your phone 7. WiFi - Control your phone WiFi using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on WiFi - Place and remove your hand again to switch off WiFi 8. Data Connection - Control your phone data connection using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on Data Connection - Place and remove your hand again to switch off Data Connection 9. GPS - Control your phone GPS using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on GPS - Place and remove your hand again to switch off GPS 10. Bluetooth - Control your phone bluetooth using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on Bluetooth - Place and remove your hand again to switch off Bluetooth Get all of these awesome features on your phone now. How It Works: Air Gesture Control is a PROXIMITY sensor based application. Every phone has this sensor to switch off screen when talking over phone Proximity Controls: 1. Hovering - Place your hand over Proximity sensor and remove your hand. 2. Wave Once - Wave within the range of Proximity sensor quickly once 3. Wave Twice - Wave within the range of Proximity sensor quickly one after other, two times Great for: Driving - Focus only on driving, safety first Press Conference- Wave and record while others are searching for a way to record PushUps - Use Air Gesture Control to keep track of your push ups At your desk - No need to look at your phone, change to next song by waving Cooking - Hands covered with oil, well just wave at your phone for next song Cleaning - Don't worry about getting dirt on your phone Eating - No more food stain on your phone screen Working Out- Don't fall off the treadmill while changing to next song Show off - Well be a Ninja, Jedi or Shaolin monk, take your pick **IMPORTANT** Air Gesture Control is tested on HTC, Samsung, Sony, LG, Micromax, Karbonn, Lenovo and Lava phones If there is a problem, please email me at intankcorp@gmail.com and give me a chance to figure it out before leaving a bad review! Known Issues: If your phone/Tablet does not have PROXIMITY sensor, Air Gesture Control will not work on your device. :( Permissions Needed: Bluetooth: To switch on Bluetooth Camera: To switch on Flash Light (Torch) Microphone: To record Audio data Storage: To store recorded Audio data Network communication: To switch on WiFi Tags: Air Control, Wave Control, Proximity Control, Proximity Sensor Developed on HTC ONE X

description: AgeAnalyzer has been created out of curiosity and fun. It make complex calculations to provide interesting information from your date of birth. It derives information about your age from your date of birth. It provides interesting information like - * age in years, months, days * age in hours * age in minutes * age in seconds * zodiac sign * chinese sign * days until next birthday Hope you like it!

BMI (Body Mass Index) is a measurement of body fat based on height and weight that applies to both men and women between the ages of 18 and 65 years. BMI can be used to indicate if you are overweight, obese, underweight or normal. A healthy BMI score is between 20 and 25. A score below 20 indicates that you may be underweight; a value above 25 indicates that you may be overweight. Please remember, however, that this is only one of many possible ways to assess your weight. If you have any concerns about your weight, please discuss them with your physician, who is in a position, unlike this BMI calculator, to address your specific individual situation.

--- What's New in Version 1.0.1 --- - switch between QWERTY and Fancy Keyboard ======================== Fancy Keyboard allows you to type with fancy unicode letters straight out of the box. Using this keyboard, you can type various cool and funky letters and impress your peers and colleagues. As the letters are integrated into the keyboard, you can directly type wherever you wish such as SMS, WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and so on. Fancy Keyboard is an assistive mechanism for popular apps such as Fancy Text Generator. Use of this will complement the functionality. It is created with keeping the users in mind. --- Steps to configure the Fancy Keyboard after installing the app, 1. Download & Install the application from Google Play 2. Go to Settings -> Language & input 3. In Keyboard & Input Methods, tick the Fancy Keyboard option 4. Your keyboard is now enabled. To use it, open any application 5. Tap on the field where you wish to type 6. a. [Android 4.0 + ] A small keyboard icon will be displayed on the top left of the screen. Drag the notification bar down and click 'Select input method' b. [Android 1.6 - 2.3] Long press the editable text field and select 'Choose input method' Select 'Fancy Keyboard' as the preferred input method 7. Choose 'Fancy Keyboard' and start typing to use the app. To switch back to the default keyboard, just change it from the notification bar. For details, check screenshots attached. -- If you face any problems while configuring your keyboard, do not hesitate to email the developer. Your queries will be responded to on priority. Enjoy!

This Income Tax Calculator can be used to compute tax liabilities for salaried individuals only. The tax calculator is frequently updated when tax rules change and to correct errors. Please check back frequently to ensure that you have the latest version. This tax calculator can be used for tax planning to calculate the approximate tax payable by salaried individuals. This should NOT be used to compute the actual taxes to be paid to the Government. The developer is not responsible for any inaccuracies in the tax computed by this calculator.

Wired Equivalent Privacy (WEP) is a security algorithm for IEEE 802.11 wireless networks. This application enables you to genarate a WEP key for your wireless network. The strength of the key can be chosen by the user such as: ● 64-Bit ● 128-Bit ● 256-Bit This application makes it relatively easy to use a WEP key for your wireless network without having to enter it manually. In addition to WEP keys, the application also allows the user to generate WPA keys for better and enhanced protection. PRO feature: Use custom phrases of length 5/13/29 for generation of 64/128/256 bit keys.

The Tip Calculator will instantly calculate the tip for a bill and even show what the split should be for multiple people on the same bill. Just enter in the total bill amount, the desired tip percentage (15%, 18%, 20%, etc.), and how many ways (if any) that the tip should be split up. Doing tip calculations is super easy with tip calculator.

NEW v2.0 - with fresh new look and feel, stylish yet functional !!! The definitive classic on military strategy and tactics, presented in an awesome appbook format. The Art of War (attributed to Sun Tzu, of late-6th century BC) is one of the oldest and most prestigious books on military strategy in the world, influencing business tactics, military thinking & beyond. As a treatise on the anatomy of organizations in conflict, it applies to competition & conflict in general, from the interpersonal to the international and remains relevant even today. Presented in an awesome, fluid UI with loads of themes and customization options, the app ensures the perfect reading experience on your mobile device. You can quickly save/load relevant text using the convenient favorite tags. The app also allows you to easily copy/share quotes from this masterful classic. Features: ~ Fluid & highly customizable interface. ~ Easily share or copy quotes. ~ Save/reload favorite quotes. ~ Multiple well-designed visual themes. ~ Fullscreen mode supported. ~ Navigate via chapters or paragraphs. ~ Small size. ~ Ad-free experience!!!
release_text: Version 2.0 released. ~ Fully redesigned fluid UI ~ Share/copy quotes functionality ~ Favorite tags for easy access ~ Updated visual themes ~ Gesture info dialog on init

Smart Quotes is an awesome home widget that displays periodic quotes with a sleek, modern and customizable interface to pep up your home screen. description: *** Acclaimed Tron-like graphics with smooth gameplay *** NeonBlaster is the smashing new brick blasting action game inspired by Atari's Arkanoid. Campaign mode provides you 60 different levels to be unlocked. The game also features an unlimited arcade mode for your gaming pleasure. The game supports both local and global leaderboards. Match up against the best scores around the world!!! (powered by openfeint). With smooth intuitive touch controls, cool glowing effects, particles and other special effects, its the ultimate addictive retro fun. Get it now and get hooked :) Game features: > Sleek graphics with retro glow effects. > Loads of special effects. > 60 levels in campaign mode alongwith unlimited arcade mode. > Smooth, intuitive controls. > Fun bonus/brick types. > Support for global leaderboard. > Sound effects/vibrations. > Particle effects.

description: Ladys Calendar Pill is the app for tracking birth control pills. Easy setup and just tap pill images on the calendar when you take them. So simple! You can save journal and memos too! Features ・Birth pill setting：a sheet of pills, start date and alarm setting. ・just tap pill images on the calendar so you can understand whether you took the pill or not at one view. ・Save journal and memos. ・Add marks on the calendar for the schedule management. ・Easy backup through the internet using Export Cloud function. ・Weekly and list displays are available. ・Change calendar size by Setting of the menu. ・Email the calendar as an image. ・Password setting. ・Setting for volume and sound for alarm. ・Mark setting, Data recovery and Other backup etc...

Appreciate the small things with the Bugz-n-Slugz guide to the little critters. A field guide to a variety of Bugz (Arthropods) and Slugz (Mollusca) found in the Castle Cove area of Sydney, Australia. This guide has been produced from data aggregated by the Gaia Guide website ( http://www.gaiaguide.info/ ) The coverage of species is currently very limited (around 85 species). This guide has been created to encourage children to find out more about the critters that can be found in the backyard, the school grounds, the beach or the park. As they contribute sightings, images and even their own (hopefully assisted) research on the Gaia Guide Website, they will be able to see their own contributions flow through to this field guide.
release_text: Added new filter-based search system. Improved the user experience.

description: A field guide to the wide variety of plants and animals of Western Australia's iconic Kimberley Coast. This field guide is an ideal pocket companion for people on cruise expeditions of the Kimberley Coast. It covers a wide range of: - Whales, Dolphins, Dugong, Sharks, Fish, and Turtles - Birds - Mammals - Reptiles - Butterflies, Moths, Beetles and Spiders - Trees and Shrubs Use it to make identifications, record your observations, and upload them to the Gaia Guide website to share with friends.
release_text: Improved filter-based species search system. Improved user experience. More detail added to species descriptions.

description: This is a field guide to the wildlife at Lady Elliot Island, located at the southern end of Australia's Great Barrier Reef. It covers: * The incredibly varied sea-bird life * Most sharks and rays * An extensive range of fish * Many corals, shellfish, nudibranchs and other invertebrates * Reptiles * Common plants Descriptions include over 1200 images of marine invertebrates, 500 images of marine invertebrates, and 200 images of terrestrial vertebrates including birds. Descriptions also include distribution maps, information on distinguishing features, behaviour and habitat preferences, along with links to further information. The data has been extracted from the Gaia Guide ( http://www.gaiaguide.info/ ) and is based upon information about islands in the area from the Atlas of Living Australia and from staff at the Lady Elliot Island Resort. In particular, the launch icon is based on the manta ray photo by Chris Garraway, long time dive master at Lady Elliot Island's dive shop and enthusiastic supporter of project Manta ( http://earthwatch.org/expeditions/project-manta) . The app provides power search systems to rapidly identify species based upon their size, wingspan and colour. It is much easier to use than leafing through huge fish books, squinting at tiny postage stamp images in the hope of recognising what you saw. If you find something new, consider uploading a photo with a record via the app. Often enough, the species can be later identified by experts and added to the field guide, with attribution: too much fun as a contributor.
release_text: New system for searching by colour and size. Complete coverage of colour details for birds. Also good colour data for many of the fish and nudibranch species. Many new invertebrate species. Much improved record keeping system.

description: The data in this field guide has been prepared by staff at the Lizard Island Research Station on the Great Barrier Reef, north of Cairns in Queensland, Australia. It covers many of the most commonly encountered marine and terrestrial plants and animals that can be found at and around Lizard Island. It has a wide range of birds, fish, and corals and most of the identification images are sourced locally. The field guide provides extensive information about appearance and behaviour of the species, including details on where they are found around the Island. The information remains accessible on your device, even when you do not have a network connection. You can also use the app. to send information about your own sightings, including photos, back to the Lizard Island Research Station. Record the sightings as you go and then upload them when you are back on the network.
release_text: Addressed problems with app. resetting itself if record uploads are interrupted by network connection issues.

description: Gaia Guide ( http://www.gaiaguide.info/ ) is a collection of online field guides. With over 5,000 (mainly Australian) species described, including nearly 12,000 identification photos, Gaia Guide is a great way to get to know the many species around us. When you are heading into the wilderness and a long way from your Internet connection, this app. is the best way to take Gaia Guide field guides with you. Highlights include: * Search for species by size, colour and other characteristics * Search by scientific and common names * Capture and upload records to share with others * Integration with device camera and photo gallery to add specimen photos to records * Only download the field guides that you want to carry with you * Combine data from multiple field guides into a single app. * Don't wait for data updates: ensure you have the latest data from the server before you travel DETAILS: To use Gaia Guide Mobile, first register with the Gaia Guide website. Then use the website to select the field guides you want. Next download them to your mobile device with a single button. With the data on you device, you are ready to to explore the great outdoors, with or without an internet connection. You can perform all of these steps through the app itself, if you have an Internet connection. Search among the species that you downloaded, add records, document them with photographs, location and time details and other notes about the specimens you have observed, ready for upload your findings to the Gaia Guide website upon returning to civilisation. Your records will be available on the Gaia Guide website for you and other users to benefit from. Travelling to a new destination? Simply log into the Gaia Guide web site, select a different set of field guides and download them. You are all set to go again. Best of all, when you discover something new and special about a species, you can log into the Gaia Guide website when you get home and share your insights with other users.

A field guide to the wildlife that can be found in and around Sydney, Australia. The guide includes most birds, many fish, many mammals, a number of reptiles, and a number of invertebrates. It also includes a small but growing number of plants. Note that the species included in this guide are determined as follows: all species with Sydney-area records in the Atlas of Living Australia have been included if the Gaia Guide has a representative image of that species. Thus, some species are included because of erroneous records in the Atlas of Living Australia. Other species are omitted from the field guide because the Gaia Guide does not yet have sufficient information to provide identification assistance. You can improve the quality of the data in this field guide by contributing information to the Gaia Guide ( http://www.gaiaguide.info/ ).
release_text: Improved species search mechanism using colour and size data where it is available. Improved user experience. More complete species descriptions.

description: A field guide to the birds, mammals, reptiles, and amphibians of the beautiful Yalgorup National Park in Western Australia. It covers 208 species and includes many images that will assist with making identifications in the field. The guide can be used without an internet connection. You can use the guide to record and upload your own sightings. These records remain available on the Gaia Guide website for your own purposes and they are also fed into the CSIRO's Atlas of Living Australia.
release_text: New search system allowing for search by colour and size. Improved record capture system. Better user experience. Significantly improved species descriptions.

description: 300 of the most important aircraft such as the Concorde, Boeing 737 and 747 in civilian service available in one app. These range from the earliest pioneers to the massive passenger jets of the modern age, representing the diversity of aircraft in use throughout the world for tourism and commerce. These include famous passenger planes such as the Concorde, Boeing 737 and 747, as well as the Learjet, Tiger Moth and Jetstream. Each aircraft featured is illustrated by a full-colour side-profile artwork, and accompanied by a detailed specifications table. All measurements are given in imperial and metric measures. In addition there is accompanying text for each aircraft that summarizes their development and service history. ★ 300 civil aircrafts, each one illustrated by a full-colour artwork ★ Full dimensions, weights, performance and armaments provided for each aircraft, all measurements in imperial and metric ★ Each aircraft’s development history and career described in full ★ Quick search functions ★ Favorites section ★ All data stored offline on your device's SD card. Internet connection only required for the first database download (ca. 30MB) or for database updating. Author Robert Jackson is a former pilot and navigation instructor. As a writer in military, naval and aviation affairs, he has more than 80 books to his name, including Suez: the Forgotten Invasion, The Royal Navy in World War II and Strike From the Sea: A History of British Naval Air Power.

Gesund und schmackhaft: 1000 Kräuter und Heilpflanzen von A bis Z Heilpflanzen und Kräuter haben uns seit jeher fasziniert und ihre Wirkstoffe sind auch heute noch ein wichtiger Bestandteil vieler Arzneien und Pflegeprodukte. Immer mehr Menschen vertrauen der heilenden Kraft aus der Natur und wollen mehr darüber erfahren. Mit weit über 1000 detailgetreuen Farbillustrationen und informativen Texten zu jeder Art gibt dieses Nachschlagewerk einen umfassenden Überblick über die in Europa gebräuchlichen Heilpflanzen und Kräuter aus aller Welt. Von der heilkräftigen Aloe bis zum schmackhaften Zimt werden alle wichtigen und auch teils schon in Vergessenheit geratenen Arten und ihre Verwendung vorgestellt. Detaillierte Angaben zu jeder Art, wie alle gebräuchlichen Namen, ihre Herkunft, Größe, charakteristische Kennzeichen, Wirkung und Anwendung, machen diese App zu einem unentbehrlichen Nachschlagewerk zum Thema Naturheilkunde und Gesundheit. ★ Elektronisches Lexikon mit mehr als 1000 Fotos der Heilpflanzen und Kräuter. ★ Detaillierte Angaben zu jeder Art, wie alle gebräuchlichen Namen, ihre Herkunft, Größe, charakteristische Kennzeichen, Wirkung und Anwendung. ★ Die Selektion nach Größengruppe und Kontinent. ★ Mit Angaben zu Herkunft, Größe, charakteristischen Kennzeichen, Wirkung und Anwendung. ★ Suchfunktion zum schnellen Auffinden der Kräuter und Pflanzen. ★ Ausführliche Informationen zum sicheren Umgang mit Heilkräutern, Inhaltsstoffen und ihrer Wirkung, und zur Zubereitung von Kräuterarzneien. Healthy and tasty: 1000 Herbs and Spices A to Z Medicinal plants and herbs have always been fascinated and their agents are still an important part of many medicines and toiletries. More and more people rely on the healing power of nature and want to learn more. With more than 1,000 detailed color photographs and informative text to this reference work of any kind is a comprehensive overview of the common European medicinal plants and herbs from around the world. Of the healing aloe to delicious cinnamon all important and panic even some already forgotten species and their use are presented. Detailed information about all kinds, including all common names, their origin, size, characteristic features, properties and application, make this app an indispensable reference work on natural healing and health. ★ An electronic dictionary with more than 1000 pictures of medicinal plants and herbs. ★ For details of all kinds, including all common names, their origin, size, characteristic features, properties and application. ★ Selection by size group and continent. ★ With information on the origin, size, characteristic features, properties and application. ★ search feature to quickly find the herbs and plants. ★ Detailed information about the safe use of medicinal herbs, ingredients and their effects, and to prepare herbal medicines.

description: We watch video everyday. Some of video streaming apps is do not hide soft keys (home / back / recent apps key) during full screen video playback. It is very annoying and disturbing. description: This app allows you to measure and visualize the strengths of any magnetic or WiFi fields, within any rectangular region you chose, without the need for any special devices! Field Visualizer allows you to "see" the otherwise invisible magnetic/WiFi fields by plotting the strengths at each point in space on a 3D mesh. This 3D mesh is overlaid on a real-time camera preview, which gives the user a near Augmented Reality experience. Various 'Viewport' and 'Graphics' controls allow the user to tweak the rendered 3D mesh to their liking, and then align it with the measured region as seen by the camera. Save the final image and share it with your friends. Detailed instructions on how to use the app are given in the app's "Help" page. Tested on: - Samsung Galaxy S4 (Android 4.2.2) - Samsung Galaxy SII (Android 4.0.3) - Asus Transformer Pad TF300T (Android 4.1.1) - Samsung Galaxy Ace (Android 2.3.6) Enjoy seeing the invisible! ;)
release_text: Version 1.1 - Fixed crash bug at startup for some new Android devices - Fixed issue with WiFi initialization for some Samsung Galaxy devices.

description: Ever wanted to draw a sound wave and hear how it sounds like? Draw a Sound allows you to do just that. Draw any waveform that you can imagine, and click the "Play" button to listen to it. You can change the timescale of your wave so that you can hear the tone at different frequency ranges. The app will repeat the wave you have drawn to produce a full playback time of about 3-4 seconds.

A real-time physics based game where you have to use springs and gravity to get the balls to the hole. SpringAim has many levels of varying difficulty where the user has to avoid collisions with obstacles placed in the scene. Drag the green balls, release them and then let the physics take care of the rest! Position the balls correctly to get to the hole in the shortest time. The blue balls cannot be moved by the user, but they will move under gravity and also undergo collisions with other objects. Make use of the "Detonatable" balls to explode existing balls and create more balls to increase your chance of getting to the hole.
release_text: Version 1.1 > Fixed some controls and graphics bugs.

description: A real-time physics based game where you have to use springs and gravity to get the balls to the hole. SpringAim Lite has many levels of varying difficulty where the user has to avoid collisions with obstacles placed in the scene. Drag the green balls, release them and then let the physics take care of the rest! Position the balls correctly to get to the hole in the shortest time. The blue balls cannot be moved by the user, but they will move under gravity and also undergo collisions with other objects. You have 30 seconds to reach the target.
release_text: Version 1.1 > Fixed some controls and graphics bugs.

description: Simulate the flow of a liquid around any object that you draw! Streamline lets you visualize the flow field about any shape or group of shapes by using animated particles or streamlines. You can generate particles of different colors during the simulation to help you understand the flow easily. Click on the screen while the simulation is running to generate a blob of particles at any location you want, and watch it get carried away with the flow! Streamline also has a few preset objects which you can load and run easily. The application is also able to compute the pressure field of the fluid flow and display it using a color map. You can change the direction of the incoming flow by changing the angle of attack within the full 360 degree range. The application supports both portrait and landscape orientations. Check out this blog for info on Streamline : http://savreality.blogspot.com/2012/12/streamline.html Join our Facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/i.realitysoft
release_text: Version 1.3 > Increased accuracy and performance > Added new preset objects > Improved graphics > Bug fixes

Það að vera með allar fótboltafréttirnar á einum stað er auðvitað bara brilliant :) ★★★★★ | Jón Gunnar Geirdal, Frasakóngur Það er allt að frétta í Lummunni, klárlega. Nýtt í Lummunni 3.0: ---------------------- ● Ný hönnun - Alger andlitslifting á appinu. ● Twitter - Nú er hægt að fylgjast með hvað allir helstu fótboltaspekingarnir eru að segja. ● Stillingar á miðlum - Nú getur þú valið hvaða fréttamiðla þú vilt hafa sýnilega og hverja ekki. ● Myndbönd - Búið er að laga ýmsa bögga með myndbönd - nú er t.d. hægt að horfa á þau í "full screen". ● Hægt er að velja á milli tveggja frétta-viðmóta (stórar eða litlar myndir) ● Deila: Nú er hægt að deila fréttunum á mun einfaldari hátt á Facebook, Twitter, tölvupósti og fleiri miðlum. Nýtt í Lummunni 2.0: ---------------------- ● Markaskorarar - Nú getur þú séð hverjir skora mörkin í úrslita-hlutanum ● Spjöld - Er Jarlinn spjaldaglaður? Fylgstu með gulu og rauðu spjöldunum ● Nýtt look - Við erum búnir að senda Lummuna í smá make-over. Hvað er í Lummuni 1.0? ---------------------- ● Fréttir - Einföld fréttaskjámynd með öllum helstu fótboltafréttunum ● Úrslit - Staðan í leikjum dagsins hér heima og erlendis ● Stöðutöflur - Staðan í helstu deildum í Evrópu ● Facebook - Hægt að deila fréttum með vinum sínum á Facebook ● Twitter - Vertu með puttann á púlsinum á Twitter

description: Með þessu appi færðu aðgang að þúsundum tilvitnana, beint í símann eða spjaldtölvuna. Þú getur flett upp og leitað í um 7000 tilvitnunum sem sumar hafa hafa lifað með þjóðinni í þúsund ár meðan aðrar hafa orðið til á síðustu árum. Hægt er að leita í appinu að tilvitnunum, einstaka orðum eða orðasamböndum. Einnig er hægt að leita að nafni höfundar, stað, ártali eða hverju því öðru sem þér sýnist. Appið byggir á tilvitnanaorðabók Tryggva Gíslasonar magisters, fyrrverandi skólameistara MA, en bókin kom út árið 1999 og er nú löngu uppseld.
ICELAND BY ANOTHER NAME What does Iceland mean to you? Bring back your great memories of Iceland and submit your new name for the island in the North.

More important information: The GPS position will not be more precise than what your device is able to show. You also understand that the app will dial 112 - and that this number may have different purposes in different international regions.

description: Fáðu allt það helsta frá Póstinum beint í snjallsímann þinn. Farsímaforrit Póstsins er ný og flott leið fyrir þig til að hafa allt sem þú þarft og vilt vita í vasanum. Með appinu geta viðskiptavinir fundið sendingu sem hefur verið póstlögð, keypt SMS Frímerki fyrir allt að 50 bréf, fundið næsta pósthús á stafrænu korti eða einn af 230 póstkössum sem gæti verið handan við hornið. Ef þig vantar að vita verð á helstu vörum og þjónustum Póstsins er appið sniðið fyrir þig. En í appinu er að finna öll helstu verð til einstaklinga. Upplýsingar tengdar jólum, öðrum hátíðum eða árstíðarbundnum þjónustum fá sitt pláss í appinu. Fyrir jólin geta viðskiptavinir fundið allar upplýsingar um síðustu skiladaga, opnunartíma pósthúsa um allt land og staðsetningar Jólapósthúsa í verslunarmiðstöðum. Lendir þú í vandræðum eða vantar frekari upplýsingar tryggjum við tengslin með flýtivalstakka sem gerir þér kleift að hringja á Þjónustuborð Póstins þar sem þú getur leitað til þjónustufulltrúa með frekari lausn þinna mála. Helstu eiginleikar Finna sendingu: Sláðu inn Viðtökunúmer sem þér, eða þeim sem póstlagði, var úthlutað við póstlagningu. Viðtökunúmer er þrettán stafa röð sett saman af tveim bókstöfum í upphafi, níu tölustöfum og að lokum tveim bókstöfum. Dæmi: IP123456789IS SMS Frímerki: Nýtt á íslandi! Sendu SMS með stuttkóðanum F (bil) 1 í 1900 og fáðu til baka fimm (5) tölustafa runu sem skrifuð er á hefðbundinn stað fyrir frímerki á bréfi (uppi í hægra horn bréfs). Talnarunan gildir þá sem frímerki. Hægt er að fá senda talnarunu sem gildir fyrir allt að 50 bréfum. Talan í stuttkóðanum segir til um fyrir hve mörg bréf talnarunan gildir. Dæmi: F (bil) 1 - > talnaruna gildir fyrir 1 bréf. F (bil) 50 -> talnaruna gildir fyrir 50 bréf. ATHUGIÐ: Hægt er að senda SMS Frímerki í gegnum hefðbundin SMS á öllum farsímum og er ekki bundið við appið. Flýtivalshnappur á Þjónustuver: Hægt er að hringja í gegnum appið á Þjónustuver Póstsins. Kort: Stafrænt kort gerir viðskiptavinum kleift að finna næsta pósthús eða póstkassa um allt land ásamt opnunartíma og póstnúmeri viðkomandi staðar. Verðskrár: Öll helstu verð til einstaklinga er að finna í appinu. Árstíðarupplýsingar: Jól, hátíðir og árstíðarbundin þjónusta er staðsett í appinu á völdum tímum. Mundu eftir að leita eftir því helsta. Það er aldrei að vita hvað leynist uppi í hægra horninu.
release_text: * A og B póstur í SMS frímerkjum

description: 20XX年、突如現れた宇宙からの侵略者 「ツーケーナヒ星人」の圧倒的科学力、戦力に 人類は全面降伏を余儀なくされてしまいました。 しかし、にとりの作った兵器が初めて星人の宇宙船に傷を付けます。 その兵器は、「雛ちゃんをいじる際に生じるエネルギー」を 動力とした画期的なものでした。 全人類の存亡を賭け、雛ちゃんの長く険しい戦いが再び始まったのでした。 もっと雛ちゃんのケツを蹴っ飛ばせ！！ 雛ちゃんのケツを蹴っ飛ばすことで エネルギーが溜まっていきます。 気の向いたときにどんどん蹴っ飛ばしましょう。 通貨としても使えるエネルギーで、 あらたな雛ちゃんをいじるアイテムを購入し、 小麦粉をかけたりゲームを妨害したり頭上で焼き肉をしたりして さらなるエネルギーの充填を目指しましょう。 さらにそのエネルギーで兵器を生産し 溜まったエネルギーを消費して侵略者を迎撃しましょう。 帰ってきた雛ちゃんタウンの施設を有効活用し、 余ったエネルギーで雛ちゃんいじりアイテムを強化し、 設置した兵器を改造し、 地球の平和を取り戻しましょう！ ※本ゲームは定期的にオートセーブされます。 また、場面切り替えやゲーム終了時等にもオートセーブされます。 ※「雛ちゃん」は「東方project」のキャラクター「鍵山雛」です。 ☆リアクション芸人気質の雛ちゃんはいじられても内心美味しいと思ってるのでご安心下さい。
release_text: ver1.01 ○以下の変更はゲームプレイには影響しません ・誤字修正を行いました。 ・タウンでバックキーを押すとオプションに移行するようにしました。 ver1.02(7/11) ○以下の変更はゲームプレイには影響しません ・誤字修正を行いました。 ・カンスト時のツイート内容を変更しました。

description: Read the new Focus thanks to a user-friendly application, updated every month and rich in content. Science and nature, technology and behavior, medicine and economics, history and ecology. In every issue of Focus many proposed topics with a clear and simple language, with fascinating and exclusive images. News, discoveries, ideas for those who are curious about the world around him and the time in which he lives. Thanks to this application you can browse every month and read the new Focus and in addition you will have access to all the extra content: video, photo gallery and documents designed to enrich and complete the analysis of the newspaper. • Chose among the issues present in the newsagents. • Buy and read every single issue of the magazine • Deepen with extra contents: videos, images, documents and related links of the articles. • Access to your downloaded issues in My library section • Rate the App on the PlayStore

description: Battery Ace keep track in detail of your battery level. Widget and notification indicator are independent, you can chose to use one, the other or both. description: Photo Effects is an easy and fun way to enhance your personal photos. It makes your photos beautiful with easy and powerful editing tools. Photo Effects provides tens of photos to use as collages or borders and a lot of effects like text editing, backgrounds, stickers, bubbles, accessories, masks, frames and stencils to artists and graphic designers. Both novice and professional graphic designers and artists are using Photo Effects for work and fun! You can download it and try it for free! Features: Camera: Photo Effects enables you to take a picture, preview and apply photo live effects by enhancing your standard camera. Edit: Photo Effects awesome artistic photo effects such as a stenciler, cartoonizer, sketcher, Orton, Lomo, vintage, cross process …etc Collage: Photo Effects easy way to collect photos to one pictures and choose the effects you like such as templates, backgrounds and stitching. Album: Photo Effects create album for your favorite photos and share it with your friends in Facebook, Google+,Wechat …etc Note: We will add more fonts in a few days. Suggestions: If you have any suggestions to any fonts or translate any labels in app, Please let us know via smart.apps.ye@gamil.com

Le domande e risposte contenute nell'applicazione non hanno carattere di ufficialità. L'unica fonte ufficiale è il sito del Miur delle Scuole di Specializzazione in Medicina. Nessun legame sussiste tra lo sviluppatore dell'applicazione e il Miur. ************************************************************ In occasione dell'esame di accesso alle scuole di specializzazione in Medicina per l'anno 2012/2013 è stata realizzata questa applicazione che ben presto diventerà uno strumento indispensabile per la tua preparazione. L'applicazione contiene tutta la batteria di quiz rilasciata sul sito delle Scuole di Specializzazione in Medicina e dalla quale verranno estratte le domande costituenti l'esame di accesso. Potrai migliorare la tua preparazione anche quando sei fuori casa, e sprovvisto di connessione internet. Il test terrà traccia dei tuoi progressi, indicandoti (con valutazione negativa), le domande alle quali dedicare maggior tempo e attenzione. Sono presenti 350 domande per ogni scuola di specializzazione e 5400 domande di carattere generale. Di seguito l'elenco delle scuole: -Allergologia e immunologia clinica -Anatomia patologica -Anestesia e rianimazione e terapia intensiva -Audiologia e foniatria -Biochimica clinica -Cardiochirurgia -Chirurgia dell''apparato digerente -Chirurgia generale -Chirurgia maxillo-facciale -Chirurgia pediatrica -Chirurgia plastica e ricostruttiva -Chirurgia toracica -Chirurgia vascolare -Dermatologia e venereologia -Ematologia -Endocrinologia e malattie del ricambio -Farmacologia -Gastroenterologia -Genetica medica -Geriatria -Ginecologia e ostetricia -Igiene e medicina preventiva -Malattie dell''apparato cardiovascolare -Malattie dell''apparato respiratorio -Malattie infettive -Medicina del lavoro -Medicina dello sport -Medicina d''emergenza-urgenza -Medicina di comunita -Medicina fisica e riabilitazione -Medicina interna -Medicina legale -Medicina nucleare -Medicina termale -Medicina tropicale -Microbiologia e virologia -Nefrologia -Neurochirurgia -Neurofisiopatologia -Neurologia -Neuropsichiatria infantile -Oftalmologia -Oncologia -Ortopedia e traumatologia -Otorinolaringoiatria -Patologia clinica -Pediatria -Psichiatria -Radiodiagnostica -Radioterapia -Reumatologia -Scienza dell''alimentazione -Statistica sanitaria e biometria -Tossicologia medica -Urologia -Medicina Generale Nel caso doveste evidenziare qualche errore vi invito a segnalarlo, inviando una mail allo sviluppatore. P.S. Le domande e risposte contenute nell'applicazione non hanno carattere di ufficialità. L'unica fonte ufficiale è il sito del Miur delle Scuole di Specializzazione in Medicina. Nessun legame sussiste tra lo sviluppatore dell'applicazione e il Miur. The questions and answers contained in the application are not considered official. The only official source is the site of Ministry of Education of the School of Specialization in Medicine. No link exists between the application developer and the Ministry of Education. ************************************************** ********** When examining access to schools specializing in medicine for the year 2012/2013 was realized that this application will soon become an indispensable tool in your preparation. The application contains all the battery of quizzes released on the website of the School of Specialization in Medicine and which will be extracted from the questions forming the entrance examination. You will improve your preparation even when you're away from home, and not having internet connection. The test will track your progress, guiding you (with negative evaluation), the questions that devote more time and attention. There are 350 questions for each graduate school and 5400 general questions. Below is a list of schools: -Allergology and Clinical Immunology -Pathology -Anaesthesia and intensive care Audiology and speech therapy- -Clinical Biochemistry -Heart Surgery -Surgery of the digestive system'' -General Surgery -Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery -Paediatric Surgery -Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery -Thoracic Surgery -Vascular Surgery -Dermatology and Venereology Hematology- -Endocrinology and metabolic diseases -Pharmacology Gastroenterology- -Medical Genetics Geriatrics- Gynecology and obstetrics- -Hygiene and Preventive Medicine -Diseases of the cardiovascular system'' -Diseases of the respiratory system'' -Infectious Diseases -Occupational Medicine -Sports medicine Medicine-d'' emergency-urgency -Community Medicine -Physical medicine and rehabilitation -Internal medicine -Forensic Medicine -Nuclear Medicine -Thermal Medicine -Tropical Medicine -Microbiology and virology -Nephrology -Neurosurgery Neurophysiology- Neurology- -Child Neuropsychiatry -Ophthalmology -Oncology -Orthopedics and Traumatology Otolaryngology- -Clinical Pathology -Pediatrics -Psychiatry -Radiology Radiation- -Rheumatology -Science of Power'' -Health Statistics and Biometrics -Medical Toxicology -Urology -General Medicine Should you point out any mistakes I invite you to report it by sending an email to the developer. description: The classic Nokia Snake has become smarter nowadays! Play with Jake in a brand new game concept, a clever rewind of the classic game: an original timekiller puzzle, and a fun brain teaser. Also kids will love it, thanks to its colorful graphics! ■■ Key features ■■ ☆ Original gameplay ☆ Three game fields (5x5, 6x6, 7x7) ☆ Google+ leaderboards ☆ 32 challenging achievements to unlock ☆ from time to time, new missions to accomplish ☆ customizable snake styles ☆ relaxing music during gameplay ☆ a lot of fun! Jake is a colored snake that changes his color at every move. He loves dots and stars, but can eat them only when they match his color. Any time the snake eats a dot, he becomes longer, while stars can reduce his size. Challenge your brain, and try to increase your score making the right moves on the field. This game will rewind time back to the '97 classic Snake from Nokia, but now instead of good reflexes you will need a smart brain! Drive colored Jake with your finger as far as possible, in a funny, challenging and original puzzle game!
release_text: Missions! (new game services feature) Solved sporadic crashes at opening. Google+ login asked only one time.

app_name: エヴァロックアプリ（カヲルモデル）
description: 【エヴァロックアプリとは】 ロック画面を「ヱヴァンゲリヲン新劇場版」のデザインで彩ることができるスマートフォンアプリです。 ロック画面の背景はランダムで5種類表示され、スマートフォンを起動するごとに楽しむことができます。 ロック方法は「ボタンロック」や「スライドロック」の他に、暗証番号を設定する「番号ロック」、パターンを設定する「パターンロック」が設定でき、セキュリティを保護することができます。 「番号ロック」や「パターンロック」で設定した番号やパターンを忘れたときのために「合言葉」を設定することもできます。 ※現在、Androidの4.0以降の一部の端末で、スリープ状態から復帰した際にロック解除画面の表示が遅れる場合がございます。こちらは、今後のバージョンアップで修正予定となっておりますので、あらかじめご了承ください。 【エヴァロックアプリ　カヲルモデル】 『ヱヴァンゲリヲン新劇場版』の人気キャラクター「渚カヲル」をモチーフとしたモデルです。 ロック画面はカヲルの柔らかな微笑みが印象的な壁紙や、スタイリッシュなシルエットの壁紙など、5種類が収録されております。 カヲルファンにはたまらないミステリアスなロック画面を演出したデザインです。 【こちらもおすすめ！】 エヴァロックアプリのカヲルモデルは、現在好評配信中の「エヴァスマホきせかえ カヲルモデル」とセットで使うことでよりエヴァの世界観に浸ることができます。 「エヴァスマホきせかえ」は、『EVAGATE』にて各モデル315円（税込）で販売中です。 また、無料版として「ネルフモデル」も配信しております。 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.mediamagic.evahome&hl=ja 【ヘルプページ】 http://www.mediamagic.co.jp/android/help/lock_eva/ ※使い方でわからない時はこのページをご確認ください。 【サポートはこちら】 support-android@mediamagic.co.jp 【対応OS】 Android OS2.3.3以降 【配信元サイト】 EVAGATE（ http://eva-gate.jp ） ※3キャリア（docomo・au・SoftBank対応サイト） [And Eva lock app] It is a smartphone app that allows you to decorate the lock screen in the design of "Evangelion". Background of the lock screen are five types displayed in random, you can enjoy each time you start the smartphone. Lock method in addition to the "Lock" and "slide lock", to set the PIN number "number lock", to set the pattern can be set "pattern lock", will be able to protect the security. You can also set a "slogan" for when you forget the number and pattern that was set in the "Number Lock" and "pattern lock". ※ Currently, part of the terminal of the Android 4.0 or later, there are times when the display of the unlock screen is delayed when you return from a sleep state. Here, because it is corrected in a future version up, please acknowledge beforehand. [Eva lock app Kaworu model] It is a model that has a motif popular character "Nagisa Kaworu" of "Evangelion". Lock screen is a soft smile and impressive wallpaper of Kaworu, such as stylish silhouette of wallpaper, we have been recorded five. Kaoru is a design that directed the dying mysterious lock screen to the fan. [Also here Recommended! ] Kaworu model Eva lock app, you can more immersed in the world of Eva by use of a set with the currently popular delivery "Evu~asumaho Kisekae Kaworu model". description: ePrint allows you to print by connecting to the network through Android devices. There is no need to transfer your data to a PC. You can print photos, emails, web pages, addresses as you desire. -- Caution -- ePrint does not work on inkjet printers made by Canon, Brother, Samsung, and Lexmark because the PDL (Printer Description Language) have not been published by those companies. ---------- [Support OS] ePrint currently supports Android version 2.2 to 5.0.2. Bluetooth function is available on Android version 2.3.3 and others. [Support Printers / PDL (Printer Description Language)] ePrint works on printers that have the following printer description language installed. Please check with each printer's manufacture web site for the description language details. Please check if ePrint supports your printer's PDL before you purchase ePrint. You can also use "ePrint Free" to test beforehand. ---------- Epson Inkjet Printers - ESC/P-R (except ESC/P raster) Epson Page Printers - ESC/Page - ESC/Page-Color - ESC/Page-S (Color only) HP Inkjet Printers - PCL3GUI HP Page Printers - PCL (Except for HostBase model) Canon Page Printers - LIPS (Except CAPT) OKI Printers / Multifunction Printers - PCL - PostScript Toshiba Multifunction Printers - PCL - PS3 Ricoh Printers / Multifunction Printers (Optional kit for each printer is needed.) - PCL - PS3 Casio - CPDL/Page (Except V series and B series) Kyocera Document Solutions Printers & Multifunction Printers - PCL - PS3 Fujitsu Page Printers XL series - FUJITSU ESC/P Other manufacture's Page Printers (Brother, Samsung, Lexmark, etc.) - PCL - PostScript ---------- [Requirements] Wi-Fi - Printer is connected on the network and printed through TCP/IP (LPR). - Printer should be available for SNMP. Bluetooth - Printer should be available for OPP. (The output paper size depends on the printer's specification.) [Features] 1. Web page printing - 2up print. 2. Camera (Shoot and print) - 24 formats. (Borderless printing support.) - Date stamp or time stamp function. 3. Mail printing - Mail account setting. - Receiving mail. (POP3/IMAP) 4. Contacts printing - 3 formats. 5. Albums printing - 24 formats. (Borderless printing support.) 6. Photo calendar printing - 5 formats. 7. Add a printer - Bonjour search. - Enter IP address. 8. Print Settings - Color/black-and-white - Duplex (Limited printer models) - Sepia - Paper size (A4, Letter, A3, A5, B4, B5, HLT, Legal, 3.5x5in, 5x7in, 4x6in, Postcard, 8x10in, etc.) - Orientation (Portrait/Landscape) - Media type (Plain Paper, Glossy Paper, etc. Only for ink-jet printers.) - Print quality (Draft, Normal, High) - Copies (Up to 100 copies.) - Print image preview 9. Display supply information - Ink and toner levels. (Only for the printers enable to retrieve supply information.) [Terms of Use] ePrint conforms to the specifications of Google Play. ePrint is only available with the Google Account that you have purchased. If you set a Google account to other devices when you purchased ePrint, you can use ePrint with them. But the user should be you only. If the specification of the Google Play got changed, we may change the terms of use accordingly. Produced by e-Workshop

description: It is an application for people having a problem on the symptoms the SD card is unmounted without permission. Monitors the unmount the SD card, and re-mount automatically. It was developed by Softbank ARROWS A 101F for the original, but it seems to have resolved by the update V55R42D of 2013/10 release. I have still exposed just because some errand in other models with similar behavior. Please report from the review by all means people who work in the non-101F was confirmed. * Please turn off the automatic remount of this application if you want to unmount and remove the SD card. * This application does not mount more than that of the SD card. At your own responsibility to back up your data. In addition, please note especially because there is a possibility of failure of the SD card if the unmount is performed too often. * There is a Donate version on the market if you would like to donate for this work.
release_text: Fixed bug: Rare crash when path of the SD card wrong is specified.

description: dブックとは、NTTドコモが提供する電子書店サービスです。 dブックマイ本棚は、dマーケットdブックで購入した本を読むためのブックビューアアプリです。 マイ本棚からdブックへ移動して読みたい本を探すこともできます。 また、買った本に新刊が追加されたらお知らせが表示されます。 ※「端末IDと通話情報」のうち端末IDのみを取得し、ご利用台数を管理しております。 ※対応機種は以下のURLをご確認ください。 　 http://book.dmkt-sp.jp/information/device/ ※お使いの機種のOSバージョンがご購入時と異なる場合、対応機種でもサービスをご利用になれない場合があります。 ※ご不明な点がございましたら、「dブック」サイトのお問い合わせフォームよりお問い合わせください。 ※デベロッパー情報にあるお問い合わせメールアドレス宛には空メールをお送りください。 　自動応答により、お問い合わせフォームへのURLをお送り致します。

description: How was your day today? Why not record your life? With the JUGEM BLOG App for Android, you can: ・Create blogs quickly and easily ・Post and edit articles (as public/private/draft) ・Upload and attach photos ・Select category ・Register and manage accounts ・Post articles to Twitter ・Fetch Instagram images ・Embed videos from Youtube easily This app is appropriate for diary keeping, diet and household account management and more. We hope all of blogger like it.

A realistic claw crane game is reproduced to your smart phone. The 4th of the series which has been loved by more than 1 million players total. The prizes are various kinds of cute stuffed puppies that are very soft and limp. Realistic soft feel makes you feel being healed. Beagles,Labradors,Collies and Dachshunds and many many more. They are 148 kinds of numbers. New friends come up every day. Let's aim at the completion of the collection. The operation is simple. Just press the movement buttons and release them with sufficient timing. Swipe the screen to look into prizes for a favorite angle. For the ones who felt mortified for having not been able to get prizes at a game arcade. Get as many prizes as you want in this game.
release_text: 1.01.000 Added new prizes: Chihuahua The stuffed cats those have been hard to get are now slightly easier to grasp: Pomeranian Improved the qualities of some parts of the background. Renovated the systems of the internal processing and the UI indications (the game contents themselves do not have influence ). Discounted the price for "Remove Ad.". Purchase prices are displayed in the shop. The camera speed is more faster.

description: Lollipop lady's become a game! Earn $100,000 annually! Simple and easy one-touch-control for everybody. Let children go across the crosswalk safely! Supporting multi-touch and so you can play with your friend with one device! Aim to be topnotch rich people! Today as usual, the lady earns big money on the crosswalk!
release_text: Saving App to SD cards is available.

description: Enjoy one of the best addicting jump game. [Mr.AahH!!] Jump on the center of the platform!! A failure means you fall in to the abyss.... Who is Mr.AahH!!!? Where is he going? Who is he running from? Where is he getting this endless supply of rope? ---------------------- *Super simple/Super addicting* ---------------------- 1.Tap the screen to jump! 2.Land on the center make high score 3.Aim for the consecutive "Bull's eye" landing! ---------------------- *Not only simple but also some challenges* ---------------------- -Global leaderboard -Read the wind! Feel the gravity! -Adjust your jump by tilting your device! *This is the master pirce of simple addictive game. The first Mr. in famous Mr. game series! Presented by PONOS *Set Accelerometer to ON in Options, then you can fine-tune the movement of Mr in the air by slightly tilting your device. *In Lite version, you play play untill [E-5] and you get only 1 life!

The app achieved universal popularity! (USA,Japan,Canada,The UK,Australia and so on) ---------- "Mr." series appears! The game gives you full of thrill and excitement. Name of the game is..."Mr.Space!!" Your dexterity is the key to survival! Locate the safe place, and run for it! Simple controls meet nail-biting tension in one dynamic action game! ---------------------- **[How to Play] 1. Find the hidden "Space". 2. Escape. 3. It's that simple! ...Or is it? Escape your way to the top of the leaderboard! - Easy controls and intuitive gameplay. - Online global leaderboard. - Enjoy everyday with Today's leaderboard! - Adjustable keypad control. ---------------------- **Facts #1 in App ranking in USA,Japan and Canada. ---------------------- **User reviews -Takes no time to learn how to play. Very well put together, extremely simple, and super addicting! Very good game, sometimes simple things are just better -It really keeps you on your toe! And keep your mind moving. -This simple formula, combined with pounding, driving music, really pushes you to play your best. It creates a true sense of accomplishment, and a satisfying feeling of defeat as well. ---------------------- **Media reviews -"Mr. Space!!" may seem easy at first but the difficulty starts ramping up around level 25. Soon you'll be making split second judgments and hitting that replay button to try and top your last high score. A time waster worth checking out.(App Spy.com) -"Mr. Space!!" continues the Mr. tradition of highly energetic music, encouraging sound effects, and of course the constantly moving grid background.(Touch Arcade) ---------------------- Everybody please give it a try!!

description: #1 puzzle game, "PUZZLE PRISM"!! This masterpiece got high popularity from both users and media. Simple rule and sophisticated touch control gives you full of thrill and excitement! [How to play] * Flick left/right to rotate blocks. * Flick down to drop blocks. 1. Fill a level completely to clear it. 2. Explosion occurs when it's filled! 3. Do it on and on, then you will see a huge explosion! [What's good] -4 game modes won't make you tired of playing.(Full version) -Global leaderboard!(Full version) -Variety of achievements!(Full version) -6 fantastic BGM bring gameplay to a climax!(3 for Lite version)
